loans.name: San Juan Masias Group

texts.es:
Delia es una de los miembros del grupo San Juan Masías

Este grupo está conformado por 05 socios la mayoría se conocen entre sí. Delia es una de las integrantes, ella  tiene 39 años, es separada con 03 hijos. Delia se dedica a la venta de frutas, por ahora lo hace de manera informal en un mercado de su zona, donde es ambulante, su negocio de frutas es muy concurrido por sus caseras quienes diariamente compran las frutas frescas que ella ofrece, gracias a su trabajo puede solventar la manutención de sus hijos sobretodo pagarles la escuela y cubrir sus necesidades básicas, su mayor deseo es poder comprarse un puesto dentro del mercado, así ya no tendría que estar pagando alquiler por un espacio donde no cuenta con seguridad. Por otro lado está muy agradecida por el préstamo que EDAPROSPO le otorgara porque le servirá para comprar frutas al por mayor lo que le generara mayores ganancias así podrá seguir ahorrando para lograr lo que tanto ansia. ¡Delia agradece su apoyo!

Delia viste polo color morado.
texts.en:
Delia is a member of the San Juan Masías group which has five members, all of whom know each other. She is 39 years old, separated from her husband, and has three children. 

Delia earns her living selling fruit in the streets of the nearby market. Her business does well as the other stallholders buy fresh fruit from her every day. Thanks to her work, Delia is able to support her children and above all pay for their education and daily needs. 

Her biggest wish is to be able to buy a stall inside the market as then she wouldn’t have to pay to rent one where there is no security. She is very grateful for the loan from EDAPROSPO as it will enable her to buy fruit at wholesale prices. She will earn more money as a result and can continue saving for whatever she needs. Delia thanks you for you help!

She is the one wearing the purple top.

loans.use: buy fruit at wholesale prices

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es:
La Sra. Nancy es una persona que se define como una persona, carismática amable de carácter accesible y muy gentil con todas las personas, ella es casada y tiene tres hijos, pero solo su hija de 11 años depende de ella Nancy decidió emprender un negocio con el que pueda ayudar económicamente a su esposo, es por ello que se dedicó a la venta de cosméticos y bisutería, yéndole muy bien y ayudando en la economía de su hogar.
El crédito solicitado por la Sra. Nancy a FODEMI será invertido en la compra de cosméticos y accesorios como perfumes, cremas corporales, faciales y bisutería para la venta en local comercial que tiene y en la venta que tiene de productos bajo pedido, actualmente le esta yendo muy bien, ya que Nancy no desmaya y cada día trabaja con entusiasmo para mejorar la calidad de vida de toda su familia.
El sueño que Nancy tiene es crecer en su negocio y ampliarse a vender más productos como ropa, y con estos ingresos segur ayudando en su hogar y brindarle de una buena educación a su pequeña hija.
texts.en:
Nancy is a person who defines herself as charming, friendly, open, and very nice to everyone. She is married and has three children, but only her 11-year-old daughter depends on her. 

Nancy decided to launch a business that would enable her to help her husband financially. This is why she started selling cosmetics and costume jewelry; seeing it go well, and helping with her household finances.

The loan that Nancy has applied to FODEMI for will be used to buy cosmetics and accessories, such as perfumes, body creams, facial treatments and costume jewelry to sell in her shop and via order.  Currently her business is going very well, as Nancy does not lose heart, and works enthusiastically each day to improve the quality of life for her entire family.

Nancy's dream is to see her business grow and expand; selling more products such as clothing, and with this income continuing to help her household, and providing a good education to her little daughter.

loans.use: To buy cosmetics and accessories such as perfumes, body creams, facial treatments and costume jewelry, to sell in her shop and through orders.

loans.name: Denys Alberto

texts.es:
Denys es un hombre de 38 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su esposa, a quien ama y agradece todo el apoyo brindado, Denys es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Denys no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta hacer deporte y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Carapulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Denys trabaja como Carpintero en su pequeño talle, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos trabajos que hace y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Denys se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales de construcción, ya que al acercarse la época de lluvias, desea hacer refacciones en el techado y patio de su vivienda, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de terminar la construcción total de su vivienda y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Denys, 38, lives in the city of Ica with his wife, whom he loves and thanks for all her support.  Denys is a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic man who puts all his effort into getting his family ahead.  Unfortunately, because of a lack of financial resources and the need to work, Denys wasn't able to study for a profession, but he very much would like to have been able to.  In his free time he likes to play sports, and sometimes he cooks a delicious Carapulcra con Sopa Seca [a spicy stew served with dried potatoes] to share with his family.

On his own initiative and with a lot of effort and dedication, Denys works as a carpenter in his own shop.  He works every day from early in the morning and can work approximately 12 hours.  He's comfortable doing his job and believes it's going well for him because of the good work he does and his friendly customer service.

Denys is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help he'll be able to buy construction materials.  He wants to make repairs on the roof and patio of his house because the rainy season is approaching.  That way he'll be able to continue working and making the effort to realize his big dream of finishing all the construction on his house and expanding his business.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Dúo Pinares De San Juan Group

texts.es: Dúo Pinares de San Juan, Es integrada por  doña Ana Maria también vende  ropa variada como blusas faldas, pantalones y zapatos  productos que ella viaja a comprar  al centro de la ciudad, y llega a vender de manera ambulante  durante la  semana,  doña Ana Maria necesita invertir más capital en la venta de ropa ya que gracias a Dios en esta fecha de fin de año las ventas aumentan por lo que ella quiere aprovechar la oportunidad y así tener buenas ventas y bonitas ganancias.
texts.en:
Ana Maria is a member of Dúo Pinares de San Juan.  She sells clothing like blouses, skirts, pants, and shoes.  She travels to the center of the city to buy these products.  She sells in an itinerant manner during the week.

Maria needs to invest more capital into her business of selling clothes.  Thanks to God, during this end of the year season sales are increasing.  She wants to take advantage of this opportunity to have good sales and a tidy income.

loans.use: to buy new clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rufino

texts.es:
RUFINO tiene 52 años de edad es originario de San Pablo, San Marcos, Guatemala es vendedor ambulante actualmente tiene 2 puestos: uno ubicado en la Colonia Roosevelt y otro en las afueras de la Municipalidad de la Ciudad Capital de Guatemala.

Rufino sueña con poder poner un local y vender ropa nueva para dama y niño.

El crédito que solicita a FAPE es para invertir en blusas de dama y trajes para niño, ya que en la temporada de diciembre tiene mucha demanda y pedidos.
texts.en:
Rufino, 52, is from San Pablo, San Marcos, Guatemala.  He's a street vendor and currently has two jobs, one in the Roosevelt neighborhood and another on the outskirts of the Municipality of Guatemala City.

Rufino dreams of being able to set up a store and sell new clothing for women and children.

The loan he's requesting from FAPE is to invest in women's blouses and children's outfits, because in December he has a lot of demand and requests.

loans.use: to buy new clothing to sell

loans.name: Dúo Inspiración Group

texts.es: DUO INPIRACION este duo esta conformado por la señora Sabina de 60 años de edad quien desde ya hace varios años se dedica a la venta de  ropa variada para niños, señoritas y niñas también vende cortinas, sobre  fundas entre otras  prendas que la gente  le solicita la cual ella manda a elaborar,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de ropa para la venta.
texts.en:
The "Duo Inspiration" group. This duo includes Sabina, 60, who for several years now, has sold a variety of clothing for children and young women. She also sells curtains, pillowcases and other articles of clothing that people request and which she has made. 

She is requesting this loan in order to buy clothing to sell.

loans.use: To buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es: La Sra.  Justina tiene 57 años, casada con dos hijos de 7 y 10 años de edad, ella se dedica a la venta de comida en restaurante que se encuentra en la localidad de Pedro Lorenzo,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, La Sra.  Justina va a usar este préstamo para la compra de mesas y sillas para la ampliación de su restaurante y así  de esta manera brindar mayor comodidad a sus clientes,  su razón para solicitar este préstamo es seguir mejorando en su  negocio, La Sra.  Justina va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando insumos y así mejorando sus ingresos, su deseo para su negocio es tener una cadena de restaurantes y así brindar un  mejor servicio a su clientela. La Sra.  Justina es una persona muy trabajadora se siente feliz por la oportunidad brindada.
texts.en: Justina is 57 years old and married with two children, who are ages seven and ten. She works selling food at a restaurant located in the town of Pedro Lorenzo. This is her first loan with our institution. Justina is going to use it to purchase tables and chairs to expand her restaurant so that she can offer her customers more comfort. The reason why she is requesting this loan is so that she can keep improving her business. Justina will use her profits to continue buying supplies so that she can improve her income. She wants her business to become a chain of restaurants so that she can offer her customers better service. Justina is a very hard worker and is happy with the opportunity she is being offered.

loans.use: to purchase tables and chairs.

loans.name: Los Girasoles Del Algodonal Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Los Girasoles Del Algodonal

Este grupo está conformado por 11 socios que se conocen entre sí. Rodolfo es nuevo en el grupo y el único varón, tiene 51 años, es soltero con 02 hijos. Rodolfo se dedica al comercio vende todo tipo de artículos para cocina desde vajillas, utensilios y vasos. Son muchos años que se dedica a este negocio ofreciendo sus productos en diferentes mercados de la capital y provincias, gracias a su trabajo ha podido solventar a su familia y darle lo necesario para vivir tranquilamente. El dinero de su préstamo lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios quiere comprar una buena cantidad para poder comercializarlos en provincia. El sueño de Rodolfo es tener su propia tienda en algún mercado y que sus ingresos sean suficientes para que sus hijos terminen la escuela y se conviertan en profesionales.
Rodolfo está muy agradecido  a KIVA por el apoyo a su grupo comunal.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru! This is the Sunflowers of Algodonal Group which has eleven members who all know each other.

Rodolfo is a new member and the only man. He’s 51 years old, single, and has two children. He earns his living selling cooking items such as dishes, cooking utensils, and glasses. He’s had this business for many years and sells the products in different markets in the capital city and in the provinces. Thanks to this work he’s been able to support his family and give them the basics for a tranquil life. 

Rodolfo will use the money from the loan to buy a large quantity of cooking utensils and sell them in the provinces. His dream is to have his own store in a market and have enough money to pay for his children to complete their education and get good jobs. 

Rodolfo is very grateful to Kiva for the help provided to his whole group.

loans.use: buy cooking utensils

loans.name: Nogaye

texts.fr: Madame Nogaye, est une dame qui depuis 7 ans maintenant, exerce le métier de commerçante. Elle s’active dans la vente de poissons fumés et de poissons séchés et a installé une table dans le marché. Elle possède une clientèle fidèle dont certains  font même la commande pour un mois. Nogaye commence sa journée à 9h jusqu’à 17h de l’après-midi. Le prêt lui a permis d’épargner afin de pouvoir  améliorer les conditions  alimentaires de la famille. Elle envisage si elle a les moyens, d’ouvrir une boutique d’alimentation.
texts.en: Nogaye has been a tradeswoman for seven years now. She sells smoked and dried fish and has a table at the market. She has a loyal base of customers, some of whom place orders for an entire month. Nogaye begins her day at 9 AM and works until 5 PM. This loan allows her to save more so she can improve her family's food situation. If she has the means, she plans to open a food store.

loans.use: to buy and sell smoked fish.

loans.name: Tainoino

texts.en:
Tainoino is a 20-year-old lady. She wants to start a small business, making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of sugar and flour, a frying pan, vegetable oil, and other items to use in her pancake business.

Tainoino hopes to extend her pancake business to a bakery, in the next two years. She joined SPBD in 2012, to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensils to use in her new business, making and selling pancakes.

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia is 30 years old, married, and has two children. She wants to start a small business, making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of flour and sugar, a frying pan, vegetable oil, and other items to use to make pancakes. 

Teresia hopes to extend her business in the future. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensils she needs to start a new business, making and selling pancakes.

loans.name: Uiki

texts.en:
Uiki is 30 years old and single, with no children. She wants to start a small business, making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of flour and sugar, vegetable oil, tongs, spoons, and other items to use in making pancakes.

Uiki hopes to build a small canteen in the future. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensils to start a new business, making and selling pancakes.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es:
La Sra. Luz Marina es originaria del municipio san Rafael del sur Nicaragua es comerciante tiene una venta de productos varios básicos para el hogar y venta de cosméticos productos avon como: perfumenes, cremas para el cuerpo, shampoo, desodorante.
Doña Luz con unos ahorro Inicio su actividad comercial a visita a personas conocidas y ofertarle su producto, tuvo éxito le fue muy bien sintió la necesidad de invertir más mercadería pero no tenia capital suficiente. Realizo mi primer financiamiento con ceprodel para poder darle abasto a mis clientes, después vi la necesidad de poner una venta en mi casa de habitación para obtener más ingresos y darle más publicidad a mi producto.

Estoy casada tengo dos hija estudian, con las ganancia que me queda pago su colegio. Tenemos casa propia pequeña pero humilda con mucho calor humano.

Ahora la Sra Luz necesita un financiamiento para invertir más productos a mi negocio.
Me siento muy bien trabajar con ustedes porque he visto mi crecimiento como persona y como comerciante.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is originally from San Rafael del Sur, a town in Nicaragua. She is a saleswoman and has a shop where she sells assorted basic products for the home and also cosmetics and Avon products like perfume, body lotion, shampoo, and deodorant.

Luz started her business with her own savings. She would visit people she knew and offer them her products. She was very successful, so she decided it was time to invest in more merchandise, but she didn't have enough capital, so she took out her first loan with Ceprodel so that she could cover her customers' demand. Then she decided to set up a shop at home in order to obtain higher income and advertise her products more. 

She is married and has two children who are in school, so she uses her profits to pay for their education. They live in their own home, wich is small and humble but full of love. 

Currently Luz needs a loan to invest in more products for her business. "I feel great working with you because I have seen myself grow as a person and as a businesswoman."

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics, men and women's fragrances, and other products.

loans.name: Molia

texts.en: Molia is a 58-year-old, married woman, who has six children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu, to earn a living. Molia has requested a loan to buy to buy items she needs to begin farming those crops, like a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings and a crowbar. Molia will spend her profits to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools she needs to begin farming several crops, like a weed sprayer, chemicals, bush knives, filings and a crowbar.

loans.name: Ana Del Socorro

texts.es: Ana Del Socorro tiene 55 años, Soltera con tres hijos 17,25 y 27 años solo la menor estudia en secundaria, ella se dedica a  la venta de mercadería en genera como: Ropa Juvenil, Chinería, prendas, cosméticos entre otros, ella compra en Honduras y el Salvador vende a distintos Comerciantes tiene clientes fijos y eventuales da crédito y lo recupera semanal y quincenal, ella está muy agradecida con el apoyo que los inversionistas de Kiva les ofrece para salir adelante y tener un medio digno de trabajo .este financiamiento es para  es invertir en capital de trabajo y surtir su negocio con la compra de mercadería como: ropa de niños, adultos, en pantalones, camisas, vestidos entre otros y así satisfacer la necesidad de sus clientes
texts.en:
Ana Del Socorro is 55 years old and single with three children, who are 17, 25, and 27 years old. Only the youngest is going to school. She works selling merchandise like children's clothing, other clothing items, low-cost products, cosmetics, etc. She makes her purchases in Honduras and El Salvador and sells to different merchants. She has regular and occasional customers. She sells on credit and gets paid back weekly or biweekly. 

She is very grateful for the support Kiva investors offer for people to get ahead and make a decent living. She will use this loan to invest in working capital and stock her business by purchasing merchandise such as clothing for children and adults, pants, shirts, dresses, and other items so that she can meet her customers' needs.

loans.use: to purchase clothing, cosmetics, low-cost items, and other products.

loans.name: Solidaridad Group

texts.es:
Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Solidaridad

La Sra. Rosa es miembro del grupo y una de las fundadoras más entusiastas. Rosa tiene 75 años es viuda y vive en su casa con sus hijos que son casados. Rosa abrió una pequeña bodega en su casa con el fin de solventar sus propios gastos y no ser una carga para su familia, en su bodega ofrece toda clase de productos de primera necesidad, por otro lado los fines de semana prepara tamales  los que vende a sus vecinos y amigos del barrio, son muy requeridos para los desayunos por eso tiene muchos clientes que inclusive le hacen pedidos por cantidades mayores para diferentes eventos. Con el préstamo solicitado desea comprar productos para mejorar su bodega, en el futuro sueña con convertir su bodega en la más grande de su zona.
Rosa esta agradecida por todas las personas que hacen posible su préstamo. A todos esos inversionistas, a ella le gustaría decir ¡Muchas gracias por apoyar a su grupo comunal!
Rosa viste chaleco morado y pantalón marron.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  This is the Solidaridad group.

Rosa, 75, is a member of the group and one of its most enthusiastic founders.  She's a widow and lives in her house with her children, who are married.  Rosa opened a small grocery store in her house to pay for her own expenses and not be a burden for her family.  She sells all types of staples in her store.  She also makes tamales on the weekend to sell to her neighbors and friends in the neighborhood.  They're obligatory for breakfast, so she has a lot of customers who even request them in quantity for various events.

With the requested loan she wants to buy products to improve her store.

She dreams of converting her store into the biggest in the area in the future.

Rosa's grateful to all the people who make her loan possible.  To all those investors she would like to say thank you very much for supporting her communal bank!

Rosa's wearing a purple jacket and brown pants.

loans.use: to buy products for her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy accessories and costume jewelry for women such as barrettes, combs, etc.

loans.name: Daba

texts.fr: Daba est une brave femme qui fait du commerce de légumes depuis 7 ans. Elle achète  des légumes pour les revendre sur le marché local. Elle est à son 1er crédit et veut un financement pour renforcer  son capital. Avec le crédit, elle va acheter des aubergines, des choux et des carottes.  Daba est veuve et c’est elle qui s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de sa famille. Avec les revenus de son activité, elle génère un bénéfice qui lui permet maintenant d’épargner afin de mieux subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants et d’elle-même. Elle a comme projet à long terme d’ouvrir une boutique d’alimentation non loin de chez elle parce qu’elle pense que c’est une activité très rentable dans cette zone là.
texts.en:
Daba is a brave woman who has been selling vegetables for seven years. She is a widow who is solely responsible for her family’s daily needs. She buys the vegetables and sells them locally. She is seeking a first loan to strengthen her working capital. She plans to use the credit to buy eggplants, cabbage and carrots.

Her income-generating activity brings in a profit that allows her to save and better support herself and her children. 

Her goal is to open a food store near her home as she feels that her activity could be very lucrative in that particular area.

loans.use: to buy vegetables sch as eggplants,cabbage and carrots for resale.

loans.name: Johana De Jesus

texts.es: Johanna de Jesús a sus 42años de edad casada con 3 hijos todos menores de edad 10(Primaria), 16(secundaria) y 20(Universidad ) años de edad , ella se dedica a la  compra venta de ropa nueva como: ropa de niño, adulto, peluches, accesorios de damas, entre otros. Ella realiza sus compras en la ciudad de Managua y Chinandega las adquiere al contado y sus ventas las realiza en el municipio de Somotillo de manera ambulante y en su domicilio las vende al contado y al crédito. Johanna es una persona  muy responsable, luchadora que a pesar de que su esposo no se cuentra cerca ha podido salir adelante,  el financiamiento  que solicita es para la compra de ropa nueva, como camisas, pantalones, accesorios de damas, entre otros.-
texts.en:
Johanna de Jesús, 42, is married and has three minor children, ages 10 (elementary school), 16 (secondary school), and 20 (university).  She makes a living buying and selling new clothing: clothing for children and adults, stuffed toys, and women's accessories, among other things.  She makes her sales in the cities of Managua and Chinandega.  She buys in cash and makes her sales in the town of Somotillo as a street vendor and at home, selling in cash and on credit.

Johanna's a very responsible person who strives and has been able to get ahead in spite of the fact that her husband is not close by.

The loan she's requesting is to buy new clothing such as shirts, pants, women's accessories, and other things.

loans.use: to buy new clothing

loans.name: Marta Elena

texts.es: Doña Marta a sus cincuenta años de edad administra un negocio de venta de comidas y fritangas el cual se ubica en un centro hospitalario de san Rafael del sur, tiene seis años en dicha labor sus cliente son personas asalariadas del mismo centro o pacientes que buscan los servicios médicos de estas unidades medicas, las personas que le ayudan en su negocio son sus hijas. Es conocida como una persona de buenas costumbres de pago por lo que el dinero otorgado será devuelto este con todos sus intereses. A la vez agradece a estos organismos como kiva que ayudan para que mucha gente con visión emprendedora logren sus sueños que en algunos casos tan solo es el sostén de sus familias.
texts.en:
Marta is fifty years old and runs her own business of selling meals and fried foods.  Her business is located in the hospital center of San Rafael del Sur.  She has been working in this position for six years.  Her customers are wage-earning people in the area, or patients that are searching for medical services in these medical centers.  Her daughters help her in this business.  

She is known as a person of good payment habits.  The money granted to her will be returned with all the interest payments.  

She also gives thanks to the organizations like Kiva that have helped many individuals with an enterprising vision to achieve their dreams, which is in some cases, to just be able to sustain their families.

loans.use: to buy juice, carbonated drinks, bakery items, bulk grains, oil, and other products.

loans.name: Luis Adrian

texts.es: Luis Adrián  38 años de edad, casado con 5 hijos de 7,13,16,18 y 12años todos estudian unos en secundaria otros en primaria y universidad, anteriormente el sr. Luis se dedicaba a la venta de ganado, pero se ha detenido en su negocio y se dedica a la a la minería negocio que consiste en la compra de tierra en las minas de oro para moler la tierra y procesar para producir el oro el cual cuenta con un molino que está ubicado en su casa de habitación en donde el procesa la tierra y vende la ciudad de Somotillo a los acopiadores de oro, el sr. Luis  gracias a su responsabilidad  en sus negocio  ha podido salir adelante en la actualidad cuenta con el apoyo que se le ha brindado con los financiamiento para invertir en el negocio, ahora él está solicitando nuevamente financiamiento para invertir en la compra de tierra de minería que es su materia prima el cual es muy productiva
texts.en:
Luis Adrián is 38 years old, married, and has five children, ages 7, 12, 13, 16, and 18. They all go to school; some in high school, others in primary school and university.   

Previously, Luis sold livestock, but he has stopped doing this work and instead works in mining. His business consists of buying earth at the gold mines to grind and process, in order to produce gold. For this, he has a grinder located at his home, where he processes the earth and sells it to the gold buyers  in the town of Somotillo.

Luis, thanks to the responsible way he operates his business, has been able to succeed. Now he has the support provided through the loans, so that he can invest in his business. Now he is again requesting financing to invest in the purchase of earth from the mines, which is his raw material and is very productive.

loans.use: To buy earth from the gold mines, which is his raw material.

loans.name: Mujeres Decididas E Independientes Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Mujeres Decididas e Independientes

Yris tiene 32 años es casada y  tiene 01 hijo  de 09 años. Ella vive con su mama. Yris se dedica a la venta de manualidades que ella misma confecciona como bordados, carteras y joyas en fantasia, los trabajos que realiza son muy requeridos por sus amigas y vecinas del  barrio, gracias a los ingresos que percibe ayuda en el sustento de su familia. Yris va a usar este préstamo en la compra de materiales para su negocio.Ella sueña tener  un negocio más grande y mejorar la calidad de sus manualidades para exportar.
Yris está muy feliz por saber que muchas personas de todo el mundo la van a apoyar en su negocio, a los inversores de KIVA les dice : ¡Muchas gracias! En la foto es la primera de la izquierda viste polo a rayas verde con blanco.
texts.en:
Hello from Peru!  This is the group "Mujeres Decididas e Independientes" [Determined and Independent Women]

Yris is thirty-two years old, is married, and has one nine-year-old son.  She lives with her mother.  Yris works in selling handicrafts that she makes, like embroidery, cards, and fantasy jewelry.  Her friends and neighbors always ask for the items that she makes.  Thanks to the income she makes, she can help to sustain her family.

Yris is going to use this loan to buy materials for her business.  She dreams of having a much larger business and of improving the quality of her handicrafts so that she can export them.

Yris is very happy in knowing that many people throughout the world will be helping her business.  To the investors of Kiva, she says: "Thank you!"  In the photo, she is the first on the left, seen in a green and white striped shirt.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Ulito

texts.en:
Ulito is a 39-year-old, married woman, who has one child. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu, to earn a living. Ulito has requested a loan to buy inputs and tools for her farm, like chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades. 

Ulito will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her child's school fees.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools she needs for farming, like a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades

loans.name: Lusa

texts.en:
Lusa is a 40-year-old woman, who is married and has nine children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu to earn a living. Lusa has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades for her farm. 

Lusa will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools she needs to begin farming taro, bananas, yams and taamu.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a display case and groceries

loans.name: Aïda's Group

texts.fr:
Ce banc villageois est inauguré le 12 Mai 2010. Ce groupe qui fait partie dudit banc villageois est constitué de 20 femmes qui habitent ensemble. Elles sont parentes, voisines, amies.Elles s'activent dans le commerce.

L'emprunteur en vedette de ce groupe, Nogaye, est une femme mariée de 54 ans. Elle a 09 enfants dont 02 garçons. Elle fait du commerce d'arachide, de l’élevage d'ovins, et de l'aviculture. Elle s'approvisionne à dans les marchés environnants et dans le village. Sur la photo, elle est debout à droite avec un châle noir sur les épaules.

Avec Son prêt, elle va acheter 04 sacs de 100kg d'arachide à 20000f le sac, 01 mouton à 50000f et 02 poules à 2000f chacune.

Avec ses bénéfices, elle épargne pour acheter à l'avenir un taxi pour son fils.
texts.en:
This group is part of the Banc Villageois inaugurated on May 12, 2010. It consists of 20 women who live in near one another. They are related, friends, and/or neighbors, and they practice commercial activities.

The featured borrower is Nogaye, age 54, seen in the photo standing on the right and wearing a black scarf. She is a married mother if nine children, two of them boys. Nogaye sells groundnuts, and she also raises sheep and birds. She buys her supplies at the local markets and in the village. 

Nogaye will use her loan to buy four 100 kg bags of groundnuts for 20,000F each, one sheep for 50,000F, and two hens for 2,000F each.

She saves her money so that she may someday buy a taxi for her son.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts, a sheep and two hens.

loans.name: Faamaonia

texts.en:
Faamaonia is a 38-year-old woman, who is married and has five children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu to earn a living. Faamaonia has requested a loan to buy items she needs for farming, like chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades.

Faamaonia will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools for farming, like a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Tapuono

texts.en:
Tapuono is a 38-year-old woman, who is married and has one child. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu to earn a living. Tapuono has requested a loan to buy items she needs for farming, like chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades. 

Tapuono will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her child's school fees.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools for farming, like a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades

loans.name: Manaia

texts.en:
Manaia is a 23-year-old woman, who is single and has no children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu to earn a living. Manaia has requested a loan to buy items such as chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades, for use on her farm. 

Manaia will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her future.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools to use in farming, like a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades.

loans.name: Jhony

texts.es:
El Sr. Jhony es un joven emprendedor, tiene 29 años, es padre de dos hijos una niña de seis años y un niño de cuatro años, se considera una persona humilde, honesta, sencilla y que le gusta trabajar. Jhony trabaja como maestro albañil desde hace 4 años atrás, le va muy bien gracias a su humildad y un trabajo honesto y responsable
 Actualmente Jhony solicitó un crédito a FODEMI con el cual invertirá en la compra de herramientas para la construcción picos, palas, niveles, carretillas, moladora, herramientas necesarias para su trabajo como albañil, actualmente su trabajo está siendo muy reconocido y  cotizado y es necesario tener estas herramientas para darle a sus clientes un buen servicio.
El sueño de Jhony es el comprarse un casita para poder vivir con su familia, y darles a sus hijos una buena educación para que sean unas buenas personas y excelentes profesionales.
texts.en:
Jhony, 29, is a young entrepreneur and father of two children, a six-year-old girl and a four-year-old boy.  He considers himself to be a humble, honest, unassuming person who likes to work.  Jhony has worked as a master builder for four years; he does very well thanks to his humility and the honest, responsible work he does.

He’s currently asked FODEMI for a loan to buy building tools like picks, shovels, levels, wheelbarrows and a grinder; all tools needed for his work as a construction worker.  His work is getting a lot of recognition at present and is highly sought-after and he needs to have these tools to provide good customer service.  

Jhony’s dream is to buy a house to live in with his family and to give his children a good education so that they will become good people and excellent professionals.

loans.use: to buy tools.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corn, beans, cheese and condiments.

loans.name: Jaime Arcenio

texts.es:
JAIME ARCENIO tiene 28 años de edad es casado tiene tres hijos, vive con los hijos y la esposa en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a Labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

JAIME ARCENIO se Dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar urea, insecticidas, ranger, líquido mata plagas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar los fertilizantes.

Las compras y las ventas lo0 hace en la ciudad de Ventanas. El sueño es comprarce un lote de terrerno.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es reunir el dinero para comprarce un tractor para preparar el suelo.
En el tiempo libre le gusta dedicarce al deporte con los amigos del barrio.
texts.en:
Jaime Arcenio, 28, is married and has three children.  He lives with his children and his wife in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.

The “Paulina” communal bank is located in Puerto Pechinche Parish, Recinto La Paulina which belongs to Pueblo Viejo Canton; the members work in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Jaime Arcenio works in agriculture growing corn and rice.  He’s requesting a loan to buy urea, insecticide, Ranger [brand of herbicide] and bug killer.  With help from the loan he will be able to buy the fertilizer.  He makes his purchases and his sales in the city of Ventanas.  His dream is to buy a piece of land.

The challenge he faces is gathering the money to buy a tractor to till the soil.  He enjoys playing sports with his neighborhood friends in his free time.

loans.use: to buy urea, insecticide, Ranger and bug killer.

loans.name: Penina

texts.en: Penina is 27 years old and single with no  children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, oil, tongs, spoons, plastic bags etc. In the future, Penina hopes to extend her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services."

loans.use: to buy bags of flour, sugar, vegetable oil, tongs, spoons, etc.

loans.name: Sisi

texts.en: Sisi is a 33 year old married woman with 6 children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and tamu to earn a living. Sisi has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade. Sisi will spend her profits to extend her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade.

loans.name: Faimauso

texts.en: Faimauso is a 50 year old married woman with 6 children. She would like to start growing taro, banana, yam and tamu to earn a living. Faimauso has requested a loan to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade for her farm. Faimauso will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, weed sprayer, bush knives and a spade.

loans.name: Marie

texts.en: Marie is 22 years old and married with 2 children. She wants to start a small business making and selling pancakes in her community. To do this, she needs a loan to buy bags of flour, sugar, oil, tongs, a spoon and plastic bag. In the future, Marie hopes to extend her business. She joined SPBD in 2012 to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy bags of flour, sugar, vegetable oil, tongs and a spoon

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Las ganas y la motivación de superarse es uno de los sueños mas grandes de una joven mujer  que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejada de la delincuencia, de la que es victima la localidad en que vive, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso le solicita un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas, etc. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente satisfecha con la ayuda y asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda,  a la vez confía que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Her desire to succeed is one of the greatest dreams for this young woman who lives with her family.  She has a store where she sells primary needs products like basic grains, milk, eggs, and other things.   She has been doing this for some time and it has provided her with valuable sales experience that has allowed her to obtain greater income.  Her store is very well-known by the local people and she has many customers who prefer to buy from her because of the quality of her products, good prices, and excellent service.  She is an enterprising woman who works every day to provide her family with new horizons, far from the crime in her neighborhood.  Each day she works hard, is happy, and doesn’t want to disappoint her family.  The demand for her products has risen in the past few weeks and she needs to make a new investment.  She is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, drinks, etc.  This young woman has great payment references and is very responsible.  She is confident that she will be able to pay off her debt and bring financial security to her small home.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Esta joven mujer esta empezando un negocio de venta de ropa como camisas, faldas, pantalones, vestidos, entre otros, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y dejar la vida de delincuencia, es una de las mejores y mas grandes decisiones que ha tomado y su grupo familiar esta dispuesto a darle su apoyo, comercia de forma ambulante en los alrededores de centros escolares y desde su hogar, espera adquirir experiencia en las ventas para obtener buenas ganancias, sus precios accesibles y el excelente servicio considera que harán de ella una buena comerciante; es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, luchadora y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero, se siente muy contenta con el negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión para aprovechar la temporada por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa por mayor. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para todos.
texts.en:
This young woman is starting a business selling clothes such as shirts, skirts, pants and dresses, among others.  She wants to have a new beginning and leave behind the life of delinquency.  This is one of the best and biggest decisions she has made, and her family is prepared to support her.

She sells in the areas around schools and from the home where she lives.  She hopes to acquire sales experience, which will allow her to earn good profits.  She hopes to build a large clientele, because people will prefer her for the quality, accessible prices and excellent service.  She is an active, entrepreneurial woman, dedicated to her work, determined, and with many goals she wishes to achieve.  She is working hard to achieve a more prosperous future.  She is very content with her business.  

In recent weeks, demand has increased, which is why she wants to make a new investment to take advantage of the season.  This is why she is applying for a loan from INTEGRAL that will allow her to buy wholesale clothes.  The young woman has good payment references and is responsible.  She is committed to repaying the debt and at the same time has the hope of bringing economic security to her home and a better quality of life for everyone.

loans.use: to buy wholesale clothes.

loans.name: Oleg

texts.ru:
Олег живет и занимается сельскохозяйственным бизнесом в селе Малая Кардашинка. Он уже 20 лет занимается тепличным хозяйством , выращивая ранние и поздние огурцы, помидоры, редис, пекинскую капусту на собственном участке в 57 соток. 
Олег обратился в КИВА за кредитом суммой в 20 000 гривен для того, чтобы подготовить теплицы к сезону, закупить семена, пленку и удобрения. Олегу очень нравится заниматься теплицами, он надеется продолжать развивать этот бизнес и по возможности расширять свое тепличное хозяйство.
texts.en:
Oleg lives and works as a farmer in the village of Malaya Kardashinka.  He has been involved in the greenhouse farming business for 20 years already, growing early and late cucumbers, tomatoes, radishes and Chinese cabbage on his own 57-acre plot of land.  

He has turned to Kiva to request a loan of 20,000 hryvnia to prepare his greenhouses for the season, and to buy seeds, plastic sheeting and fertilizers.

Oleg really enjoys working in the greenhouse business.  He hopes to further develop his business, and possibly increase the number of his greenhouses.

loans.use: to prepare his greenhouses for the season, to buy seeds, plastic sheeting and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay fees for her professional degree.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La motivación de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de este hombre que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y dejar la vida de delincuencia que lo rodea, siente que es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgulloso de eso, se dedica a la venta de verduras, tomates, chiles, cebolla entre otros desde hace mas de tres años, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad del producto,  por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es un joven activo, emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero y se siente muy contento con el negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita un credito que le permita comprar verduras por mayor. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente satisfecho con la ayuda y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: Motivation for getting ahead is one of this man’s most important dreams.  He lives with his family in a home of his own.  He wants a new business and leave behind the life of crime that surrounds him.  He feels that this is one of the best decisions he has made and is proud of this.  He sells vegetables such as tomatoes, peppers, onions, and other things and has for more than three years.  He has many customers who prefer to buy from him because he provides a quality product and above all excellent service.  He is a young, active entrepreneur dedicated to his work and with many goals that he wants to accomplish.  He is working hard to reach a more prosperous future and he is happy about his business.  His customer demand has increased in recent weeks and he is asking for a loan to buy vegetables in quantity.  He has good payment references and is very responsible.  He is satisfied with the assistance and assures us that he will pay off his debt.  He is also confident that he will provide a financially secure household.

loans.use: to buy vegetables.

loans.name: Marina Concepcion

texts.es: Marina Concepción de cuarenta y dos años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus hijos en casa propia; ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas y además vende pupusas para completar los gastos del hogar, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia muy valiosa que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, comercia desde su residencia y ya tiene mucha clientela pues las personas saben que todo lo que se prepara es de primera calidad y a precios accesibles además con el mejor servicio  y el mas rápido; Marina es una mujer activa entregada a su labor, lo que más desea en su vida es cumplir sus sueños, por eso trabaja con mucho esfuerzo sabe que así alcanzara el éxito; desde hace algún tiempo aumento la demanda y  no quiere decepcionar a sus clientes, es así como decidió aumentar la producción pero necesita de capital que le permita invertir en insumos, por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz, frijoles, quesillo, chicharrón, verduras etc. Marina Concepción tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, agradece la colaboración y asegura que saldara la deuda y a la vez le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Marina Concepcion is 42 years old and lives with her life partner and their children in their own home.  She works selling tortillas and pupusas in order to pay the household bills.  She has been doing this work for a number of years and has obtained excellent experience, which allows her to earn more profit.  She works out of her home and has many customers because people know that everything she makes is of the best quality and at accessible prices, and also that her service is the best and the fastest.  Marina is an active woman committed to her work.  What she wants most in life is to achieve her dreams.  For this she works very hard because she knows this is how she will achieve success.  Recently the demand for her products has increased, and she does not want to disappoint her customers.  She thus decided to increase her production, but needs capital to buy supplies.  For this she is requesting a loan which will allow her to buy corn, beans, cheese, pork cracklings, vegetables, etc.  Marina Concepcion has good payment references and is very responsible. She is grateful for the collaboration and commits to settling her debt and at the same time giving her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: buy corn, beans, cheese, pork cracklings and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La motivación de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de esta mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y dejar la vida de delincuencia que la rodea, siente que es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, es empleada domestica desde hace tiempo, una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero y se siente muy contenta con su decisión, como toda persona trabajadora quiere mejorar sus condiciones de vida reparando su casa de algunos desperfectos pues asi traerá mas comodidad y seguridad para todos en su hogar, quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita un credito que le permita comprar  piso cerámico, cemento, herramienta etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The motivation to excel herself is one of the most important dreams of this woman, who lives with her family in her own house. She looks forward to a new beginning where she would leave the crime that surrounds her. She feels this is one of the best decisions she has made and is proud of it. She has been working as a housekeeper for a while and is an active and entrepreneurial woman, dedicated to her job and with many goals that she wishes to reach. She is working hard towards a more prosperous future and is very happy with her decision. 

As every working person, she wants to improve her life conditions and plans to repair some flaws in her house to improve the comfort and safely of everyone in her home. She will use the requested loan to buy ceramic floor, cement, tools, etc. She has good repayment references, is very responsible and feels confident that she will be able to repay the loan as well as to bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy ceramic floor, cement and tools.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
Ana, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para invertir en la recolección de la cosecha, con esto pagara mano de obra para que realicen la labor de recolección de maíz y frijol, esto ayudara para tener el maíz y frijol listos para el consumo. 
Con el préstamo anterior Ana comenta que le permitió comprar los insumos necesarios para realizar el cultivo, ella ha mejorado su producción y ha tenido la alimentación para su familia, tambien su negocio de la tienda en su casa continua bien surtido, manteniendose ocupada en dos actividades.
texts.en:
Ana has decided on a new loan to invest in gathering the harvest. With it, she will pay for laborers to harvest corn and beans. This will help to get the corn and beans ready for consumption.

With the previous loan, Ana says it allowed her to buy the necessary supplies for cultivation. She has improved production and provided food for her family.  Apart from farming, she also runs a convenience store out of her house, which she has been able to keep well-stocked.

loans.use: to pay workers to gather the harvest.

loans.name: Sonia Maribel

texts.es:
SONIA MARIBEL tiene 40 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene dos hijos, vive con los hijos y con el esposo en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

SONIA MARIBEL se dedica a la agricuktura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se deica a la crianza de gallinas, patos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, insecticidas, abono orgánico, ranger.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es tener algun día una casa y terrenos. En elt iempo libre le gusta ser los quehaceres domésticos de la casa.
texts.en:
Sonia Maribel is 40 years old and lives with her two children and her common-law husband in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

The community bank La Paulina is located in the parish of  Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina in the canton of Pueblo Viejo.  This group is dedicated to farming and livestock.

Sonia Maribel works as a farmer and grows corn and rice.  She also raises chickens and ducks.  She is seeking the loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizer, organic compost, herbicides and insecticides.  With the help of this loan she will be able to buy the supplies she needs in order to raise her crops.  She buys these supplies and sells her produce in the city of Ventanas.

Her dream is to one day have her own home and land.  In her free time she likes to do the household chores.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, organic compost, herbicides and insecticides.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de este hombre que vive junto a su grupo familiar, el posee una venta de pan francés, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, su venta es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejado de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda pues cada vez hay mas personas que necesitan del producto, pero para mantener el buen servicio necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso  solicita  un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor, levadura, etc. El joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente muy motivado por la oportunidad y asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The wish to better himself is one of this man's most important dreams. He lives with his family and sells french bread. He has already been in this business for some time, and that has given him valuable experience that allows him to obtain the best earnings. His bakery is very well known by local people, and already has a large clientele that prefer him for the good prices and excellent service. 

He is enterprising man, devoted to his work, and every day he strives to secure a better future, with new horizons, away from the social violence that his community is a victim of. Day by day, he doing his very best, as he is happy with his work and doesn't want to let his family down.

In recent weeks, demand has increased, as there are more and more people who need the product. But to maintain the good service, he needs to undertake a new investment. That is why he is applying for a loan that will allow him to buy flour at wholesale, yeast, etc. 

The young man has good payment references and is very responsible. He feels very motivated by the opportunity, and says that he will be able to pay off the debt. At the same time, he hopes he will be able to bring financial security to his small household.

loans.use: To buy flour at wholesale, and yeast.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cosmetics, creams and perfumes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy bread, sausage, meat and seasonings.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de superación y con muchas posibilidades de hacer algo grande con su vida, su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia buscando tener nuevos horizontes y olvidándose de la delincuencia que los rodea. Tiene un grupo familiar por el cual se esfuerza día a día, es muy trabajador y desde hace algún tiempo se dedica a la venta de zapatos para dama, se siente orgulloso porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados,  su negocio ya es conocido y  tiene excelente clientela, comercia en un lugar que identifico como muy bueno para desarrollar sus actividades; su meta es tener mejores beneficios que le ayuden a cumplir sus sueños. Él tiene la convicción de que si aumenta sus ventas así aumentarán las ganancias, es por eso que se acercó a solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar zapatos por mayor. Agradece la colaboración que recibirá además tiene esperanza en Dios que no lo abandonará para ya no verse influenciado por malas compañías y estar siempre ocupado en obras buenas como ésta, para así velar de la mejor manera por su familia y ser ejemplo correcto para ellos
texts.en:
He is an entrepreneurial man with the desire to overcome and has many opportunities to do something great with his life. His greatest desire is to provide a better future for his family, seeking new horizons and forgetting the crime that surrounds them.

He has a family, for which he works every day. He is very hard working, and for some time, has been dedicated to the sale of women's shoes. He feels proud because he has managed with good results. His business is known and has an excellent clientele. He does business in a place he identifies as very good for his activities. His goal is to have better benefits that will help him fulfill his dreams.

He is convinced if he increases his sales, he will increase his earnings, which is why he is requesting a loan that will allow him to buy shoes at wholesale.

He appreciates the contribution that he will receive. He also has hope that God will not abandon him, and he will no longer be influenced by bad company. Always being busy with good work like this is the best way for him to improve his family and to ensure he sets a good example for them.

loans.use: to buy shoes at wholesale.

loans.name: Juany Cesy

texts.es: Juany Cesy vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo, ella se dedica a al cultivo de maíz y frijol, tiene varios años de trabajar en el rubro y eso le ha regalado mucha experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores cosechas, el terreno de cultivo esta ubicado en una zona de alta incidencia agrícola y muy cercano a su vivienda, adicional a esto también vende pollo y cerdos porque así lograr complementar los gastos del hogar;  comercia en todos los alrededores de la comunidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela fija que la prefiere por la calidad, buenos precios y excelente servicio; Juany Cesy es una mujer activa, enérgica y dedicada a su labor siempre esta buscando las mejores alternativas que le abran camino al éxito y no piensa rendirse hasta lograrlo; en la ultima temporada de siembra tuvieron algunas perdidas y quiere recuperarse por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar semilla de maíz, frijol, abono, insecticida, herbicida, etc. Juany Cesy tiene buenas referencias de pago asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juany Cesy lives with her life partner and her son.  She grows corn and beans, and she has been in this line of work for several years.  This has gifted her with a lot of experience, which allows her to get the best harvests.  

The land that she cultivates is in an area where there is a lot of agriculture, and it is very close to where she lives.  She also sells chickens and pigs because this is the way she manages to supplement the household expenses.  She sells in all of the areas surrounding the community, and she has many fixed customers who prefer her for the quality, good prices, and excellent service.

Juany Cesy is an active and energetic woman who is devoted to her work.  She is always seeking new alternatives to open the road to success, and she will not think of giving up until she has achieved success.  They had some losses during the last planting season, and she wants to recuperate her losses.

That is why she is requesting a loan from Integral.  The loan will allow her to buy corn and bean seeds, organic fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicide, etc.  

Juany Cesy has good payment references, and she is sure she will be able to repay the loan.  At the same time, she trusts that she will give her family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy corn and bean seeds, organic fertilizer, insecticide, and herbicide.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Esta joven mujer esta empezando un pequeño negocio  una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan, golosinas, entre otros quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y dejar la vida de delincuencia es una de las mejores y mas grandes decisiones que ha tomado y su grupo familiar esta dispuesto a darle su apoyo, comercia desde su hogar en  la localidad donde vive, poco a poco sabe que podrá adquirir experiencia en las ventas y eso le permitirá obtener buenas ganancias, ya se esta haciendo de clientela pues las personas la prefieren por la calidad, los precios accesibles y el excelente servicio; es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, luchadora y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero, se siente muy contenta con el negocio, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso  solicita un credito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, pan, golosinas, bebidas. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez tiene la esperanza que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica y una mejor calidad de vida para a todos.
texts.en:
This young woman is starting a small business - a shop selling basic necessities, such as basic grains, instant products, bread and candy, among other things.  She wants a new start and to leave behind her life of crime.  This one of the biggest and best decisions that she has taken and her family around her will support her, with her store running out of the home in the district where she lives.  She knows that, little by little, she will gain experience in sales and this will help her to make a good profit.  She is already building a customer base, with many people preferring her for the quality, affordable prices and excellent service on offer.  She is an active and enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work.  She is plucky and, with so many goals to achieve, she is working hard for a good future.  She is very happy with the business and, with demand increasing the past few weeks, she is applying for a loan to invest more to buy basic grains, instant products, bread, candy and drinks.  This young woman has a good credit rating and is responsible.  She promises to pay off the debt and, at the same time, she hopes that this will bring financial security and a better quality of life for everybody in her home.
.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, instant products, bread, candy and drinks.

loans.name: Yanira Elizabeth

texts.es:
Yanira es una joven de 30 años de edad, ella vive en la ciudad de Imperial, la cual se caracteriza por tener un cliam muy variado y tambien por su agricultura y su ganaderia. Yanira es madre de un pequeño de 3 años de edad, a quien saca adelante sola ya que el padre de su pequeño la abandono cuando este era un recien nacido, pero a pesar de ello yanira trabaja muy duro cada dia oara poder darle a su pequeño todo lo necesario para mantenerlo sano y sobre todo con mucho amor.

con mucho esfuerzo y sobre odo ahorro Yanira logro iniciar du negocio de venta de pollos, pavos, entre otros desde hace 2 años, ella trabaja alrededor de 9 horas al dia y con el fruto de su humilde trabajo puede solventar con mucho esfuerzo los gastos de su hogar; ella cree que esta saliendo adelante porque su hijo es la mejor motivacion que Dios le ha podido dar.

Yanira esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podra comprar pavos para vender en la campaña navideña ya que tiene varios pedidos de sus clientes y de esta manera ella podra mejorar sus ingresos y seguir luchndo por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Sarle uan buena educacion a su hijo y Tener su local propio".
texts.en:
Yanira, 30, lives in the city of Imperial that’s noted for its varied climate and also for agriculture and animal husbandry.  Yanira is the mother of a little three-year-old boy who she supports by herself since the child’s father abandoned them when he was a newborn.  Despite this, Yanira works very hard every day to be able to give her little one everything necessary to keep him healthy and above all loved.

With much effort and above all savings, Yanira managed to start her own business selling chickens and turkeys, among other, two years ago.  She works about 9 hours daily and with the fruits of her humble work and much effort is able to cover household expenses.  She believes that she’s getting ahead because her son is the best motivation God could have given her.

Yanira is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the help they've given her she will be able to buy turkeys to sell during the Christmas season; she has several pending customer orders and she’ll be able to improve her income this way and continue striving to make her greatest wish reality: to give her son a good education and to have her own locale.

loans.use: to buy turkeys for Christmas.

loans.name: Amonkul

texts.ru: Амонкул очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Ему 29 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 1 ребенка. Его жена домохозяйка и занимается воспитанием ребенка. Амонкул является единственным кормильцем в семье. Он с детства любил животных, особенно домашних. Когда он вырос, его отец посоветовал ему заниматься скотоводством, так как они живут в сельской местности и имеют благоприятное условие для скотоводства. Амонкул занимается выращиванием коз. Козы имеют большой спрос среди населения, и поэтому Амонкул может вполне развивать свой бизнес дальше. Он запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 сомони для покупки козы. Этот займ поможет ему развивать бизнес и получить дополнительный доход. От полученного дохода он будет покупать все не обходимые вещи, как для жены, так и для своего ребенка. Он обещает, как добросовестный человек оплатить займ во время. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Amonkul, age 29, is a very hardworking and determined young man.  He is married and raising one child.  Since his wife is a homemaker and takes care of their child, Amonkul is the only breadwinner in the family.

When he was growing up, Amonkul already loved animals, especially domestic ones.  When he became older, and since the family lived in a rural area offering the perfect conditions for raising livestock, his father advised him to get involved in animal husbandry.  Amonkul now raises goats. 

Goats are in high demand among the local population, which is a great opportunity for Amonkul to further develop his business.  

He is requesting a loan of 3,000 somoni to buy some goats.  This loan will hep him to develop his business and to make an additional income.  

With his earnings, Amonkul will buy all the necessities that his wife and child need.  As a conscientious man, he promises to repay his loan on time.  He is relying on your kindness.

loans.use: to buy some goats to develop his business.

loans.name: Olimpio Valentin

texts.es:
OLIMPIO VALENTIN tiene 63 años de edad de estado civil unión lire tiene tres hijos, vive con los hijos y la compañera en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

OLIMPIO VALENTIN  se dedica a la agricutura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, ranger, polbillo, morocho.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras y la alimentación para los animales. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarce un lote de terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas y el mal clima. En el tiempo libre le gusta salir a pasear con la esposa.
texts.en:
Olimpio Valentin is 63 years old and lives with his common-law wife and three children in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

The community bank La Paulina is located in the parish of  Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina in the canton of Pueblo Viejo.  This group is dedicated to farming and livestock.

Olimpio Valentin works as a farmer and grows corn, rice and other crops.  He also raises chickens and pigs. He is seeking the loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, herbicides and corn.  With the help of this loan he will be able to buy the supplies he needs in order to raise his crops and feed his animals.  He buys these supplies and sells his crops and livestock in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a parcel of land.  He faces challenges such as crop disease and bad weather.  In his free time he likes to go for walks with his wife.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, compost, herbicides and corn.

loans.name: Norma Maricela

texts.es:
NORMA MARICELA tiene 25 años de edad  de estado civil unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo en casa de los suegros en Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

NORMA MARICELA se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, insecticidas, abono orgánico, ranger y gallinas.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá dar tratamiento a los cultivos de arroz y maíz. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarce una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Norma Marciela is  25  years old and has a son with her common-law husband.  They all live in her in-laws' home in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Ríos.

The community bank La Paulina is located in the parish of  Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina in the canton of Pueblo Viejo.  This group is dedicated to farming and livestock.

Norma Marciela is a farmer who grows corn, rice and other crops.  She also raises hens.  She is seeking this loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizer, organic compost, insecticides, herbicides, and more hens.

With the help of this loan she will be able to maintain her crops of rice and corn.  She buys these supplies and sells her crops and hens in the city of Ventanas.

Her dream is to buy her own home.  In her free time she likes to listen to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer, organic compost, insecticides, herbicides, and more hens.

loans.name: Diego Gerardo

texts.es:
DIEGO GERARDO tiene 50 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene ocho hijos, vive con los hijos y la esposa en la ciudad de Ventanas provicnia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

DIEGO GERARDO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, ranger, polvillo, morocho.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras y la alimentación para los animales. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarse un lote de terreno. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es sembrar 10 cuadras de cacao. En el tiempo libre le gusta reunirce con la familia.
texts.en:
Diego Gerardo, 50, is in a civil union and has 8 children; he lives with his children and wife in the city of Ventanas, Los Ríos Province.

The “La Paulina” communal bank is located in Puerto Pechinche Parish, Recinto La Paulina belonging to Pueblo Viejo Canton; they work in agriculture and animal husbandry.

Diego Gerardo works in agriculture growing corn and rice and he also raises chickens and pigs.  He requests the loan to buy seeds, urea, manure, Ranger [herbicide] and animal feed.

With help from the loan he will be able to buy what’s needed for the crops and feed for his animals.  He makes his purchases and his sales in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a piece of land and the challenge he faces is to plant ten ‘cuadras’ [unit of land measurement] of cocoa beans.  He likes to get together with his family in his free time.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Jackeline

texts.es:
Jackelin, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, además de ser alegre y cordial con las personas. Está casada con Justo quien es técnico enfermero y padre de su único hijo. Juntos están cómodamente instalados en su propia casa.
La actividad que realiza Jackelin es el servicio de cuidado de los dientes, para eso construyó un loca en el interior de su vivienda donde instalo una botica y clínica dental, atendiendo de manera amable y cordial a sus clientes ofreciéndoles promociones por sus preferencias, de esa manera está haciendo crecer su cartera de clientes. 
Se inició hace más de 05 años con un capital propio y con el apoyo de su pareja que le ayuda en la atención   a sus clientes.
Considera bastante rentable su negocio por las buenas ganancia que le deja ya que es muy concurrido su pequeña clínica.
Antes de comenzar con éste negocio no contaba con  ingresos propios y solo se dedicaba a estudiar, y con el apoyo de su pareja se decidió a empezar su negocio con los deseos de ser una prospera empresaria y apoyar con los gastos del hogar.
Espera de su negocio poder ampliarlo y comprar nuevos instrumentos para su clínica. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 08 con la institución MFP. Está contenta y agradecida de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. Por otro lado, comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal, pues conoce a sus integrantes y los considera ser personas amables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de  implementos y materiales para su clínica  así como inmobiliarios para la recepción y la comodidad de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jackelin, 30, is a hardworking, enterprising woman in addition to being cheerful and cordial with people.  She’s married to Justo who is a nurse technician and father of their only child.  They are comfortably living in a house of their own.

The activity Jackelin carries out is dental care.  To do so, she furnished space at home where she installed a drug store and dental clinic where she graciously and cordially tends to her clients offering them special promotions according to their preferences; she’s making her client roster grow this way.

She started out more than five years ago with her own capital and with support from her spouse who helps her take care of clients.  She considers her business to be quite profitable because of the good profits it nets since her small clinic is quite well attended.

Before starting this business, she did not have any income of her own and spent all her time studying.  With support from her spouse, she decided to start her business hoping to become a prosperous businesswoman and to help with household expenses.

She hopes to be able to expand the business and buy new instruments for her clinic.  Therefore, this will be MFP loan #8.  She’s happy and grateful to know that she will be able to count on financial support to carry out her plans.  On the other hand, she comments that she feels comfortable in her communal bank because she knows the members and considers them to be kind, mutually supportive people.

She will use the requested 2,000 new soles to buy supplies and tools for her clinic as well as furniture for the waiting room to provide more comfort for her clients.

loans.use: to buy furniture and supplies for her clinic.

loans.name: Juliana Antonia

texts.es:
Doña Juliana Antonia una señora de 58 años que desde que la despidieron de su trabajo como conserje por recorte de personal en una empresa privada se dedica al comercio donde su negocio consiste en una Fritanga ubicada en su vivienda donde ofrece a sus clientes riquísimos tacos, enchiladas, tajadas, refrescos donde lo habitual es adquirirlo por los pobladores para la cena.

Se dedica a este oficio desde hace 4 años el que le ha permitido sacar a sus hijos, sola sin el apoyo del padre y brindarles mejores condiciones de vida.
Está solicitando este crédito para la compra de plátanos, frutas, carne, pollo, aceite y golosinas con el objetivo de brindarles mayor variedad de comida a sus clientes y así atraer a los mismos.

Agradece a KIVA y Ceprodel por el apoyo brindado a los pequeños comerciantes que necesitan de este capital para seguir adelante.
texts.en:
