Juliana Antonia, 58, has been selling fried fast-food at home since she was let go from her job as a caretaker due to personnel cuts in a private firm; she sells her customers delicious tacos, enchiladas, fried plantain and soft-drinks where the custom is for residents to buy these items for dinner.  She’s been in this business for four years and it has made it possible for her to support her children alone without any help from their father and to provide them with better living conditions.

She’s asking for this loan to buy plantain, fruit, meat, chicken, oil and snacks with the objective of offering greater variety of food to her customers thus attracting them.  She thanks Kiva and Ceprodel for the support they provide small merchants who need this capital to stay in business.

loans.use: to buy bananas, fruit, meat, chicken, oil and snacks.

loans.name: Henrry Antonio

texts.es: Henrry, 26 años de edad, originario de la comunidad San Lorenzo en las afueras de Boaco, de oficio agricultor padre de un hijo de 5 años de edad. Empezó a trabajar junto con su papa cuando tenía 10 años de edad, solo logro finalizar la primaria ya que tuvo que trabajar para ayudar con los gastos en el hogar , la mayor parte de su familia se ha dedicado a la siembra de granos básicos por tradición. Actualmente se especializa en siembra de frijoles cuando no está sembrando se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado .Él está requiriendo el financiamiento para comprar 20 quintales de maíz y 4 quintales de trigo para almacenar y vender cuando empiece la escases de estos productos  de esta manera sus clientes no carezcan de este producto. Una de sus metas es lograr adquirir más tierras para ampliar sus cultivos y comprar ganado para vender.
texts.en:
Henrry is a 26-year-old native of the community of San Lorenzo in the outskirts of Boaco. He works in agriculture and is the father of a 5-year-old daughter. 

Henrry began to work alongside his father when he was 10 years old; he only managed to finish primary school since he had to work to help out with household costs. The majority of his family has traditionally worked in farming, growing basic staples. 

Currently, Henrry specializes in growing beans. When he's not farming, he makes a living buying and selling cattle. He needs this financing so that he can buy 20 quintals [2,000 lbs] of corn and 4 quintals [400 lbs] of wheat to store and then sell when there is a shortage of these products. This way, his customers will not do without these products. 

One of Henrry's goals is to acquire more land to increase his plantings and to buy cattle to sell.

loans.use: to purchase 20 quintals [2,000 pounds] of corn and 4 quintals [400 pounds] of wheat.

loans.name: Josselin Lilibeth

texts.es:
Josselin tiene 18 años de edad, esta acompañada y tiene dos hijos. Ella tiene dos años de administrar una tienda y una pupusería, negocio que aprendió de su mamá ya que a ella siempre le a gustado el negocio.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar más mercadería para su tienda como refrescos, galletas, arroz, frijoles, etc. y la otra parte la utilizara para comprar insumos como chicharrón, maíz, aceite, etc. para elaborar las pupusas. Con la inversión, espera que su negocio sea mejor para atender a sus clientes y para que sus ingresos se incrementen para comprar una casa y brindar educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Josselin, 18, is in a relationship and has two children.  She has been managing a store and pupusa business for two years.  She learned the business from her mother because she always has liked it.

The loan she's requesting from Fundación Campo is to buy more merchandise for her store, such as beverages, cookies, rice, beans, etc.  She'll use the other part to buy ingredients to make pupusas such as cracklings, corn, oil, etc.

She hopes her business will be better with the investment, so she can serve her customers and her income increases and she can buy a house and give her children an education.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store and ingredients for pupusas

loans.name: Sol Naciente Group

texts.es:
El grupo "Sol Naciente" esta integrado por 8 mujeres trabajadoras, alegres y emprenderoras cada una de ellas desarrolla una actividad economica con la intencion de dar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.

Maria Luisa-Venta de perfumeria
Nicolasa-Siembrade limon
Antonia -Estetica
Norma-Calzado
Leticia-Siembra de caña
Marcela-transporte
Maria Mercedez-Taxi
Marcela T.-Taxi

Este grupo esta ubicado en una region cañera en un pueblo llamado Maravillas.

Doña Marcela platica que hace mas de 30 años su familia compro un carro carguero, el cual renta en temporada de zafra (cuando los ingenios inician a producir azucar) rentan para el acarreo de la caña.

Doña Marcela solo estudio la primaria y esta casada con don Miguel, ella dice que como no tuvo mucho estudios inicio a trabajar desde muy pequeña y desde que formo su familia con don Miguel trabajan hombro a hombro para sacarla adelante y cada dia tener la posibilidad de una mejor vida.

Tambien nos dijo a futuro le gustaría iniciar un nuevo negocio y seguir dando mantenimiento al camion.

Un credito de Vision fond dara a Doña Marcela la oportunidad de comprar algunas piezas y dar mantenimiento a su carro carguero para continuar rantandolo.

este grupo agradece a Visión Fund por el apoyo que les a brindado a travez de estos financiamientos.
texts.en:
The Sol Naciente communal bank is comprised of eight hard-working, happy, and enterprising women.  Each one of them works at a business activity with the intention of giving their families a better quality of life.

Maria Luisa-Sells perfume
Nicolasa-Grows lemons
Antonia –Beauty Salon
Norma-Shoes
Leticia-Grows sugarcane
Marcela-Transportation
Maria Mercedez-Taxi
Marcela T.-Taxi

This group is located in a sugarcane region in a town called Maravillas.  Marcela says that over 30 years ago her family bought a cargo truck [three wheeled motorized vehicle with a large cargo bay] .  They rent it during the harvest season (when the sugar refineries start to produce sugar).  They rent it for hauling the sugarcane.

Marcela only has an elementary school education, and she is married to Miguel.  She says that because she did not have much education, she started working when she was very little.  Ever since she formed her family with Miguel, they have worked side by side in order to get their family ahead and to, each day, have the opportunity for a better life.

She also told us that in the future she would like to start a new business and continue performing maintenance on the truck.  A loan from VisionFund will give Marcela the opportunity to buy some things to provide maintenance on her cargo truck in order to continue renting it.

This group is grateful to VisionFund for the support they are being given through these loans.

loans.use: to buy some things to provide maintenance on her cargo truck.

location.town: Las Maravillas,Acatlan de Perez Figueroa, Oaxaca

loans.name: Kiyom

texts.ru: Кием образованный и толерантный человек. Благодаря родителям он получил высшее образование и всю свою жизнь проработал честно для благо получения своего народа. Ему 50 лет. Он женат и на воспитании имеет 5 детей. Его жена домохозяйка и поэтому он является основным кормильцем, хотя его старшие дети тоже работают. Последние 5 лет он работает в средней школе и является одним из лучших учителей. Полученную зарплату он использует для нужды семьи и поэтому не может сделать сбережения. Недавно его дочь выходит замуж и он должен дать приданное для дочери. Он хотел бы подарить мебель для будущего дома своей дочери. Кием и его дочь были в мебельном магазине и его дочь показала отцу мебель, которую она хочет получить в подарок от отца. Кием не смог отказаться ей, хотя не имеет денег для покупки дорогой мебели. С целью покупки мебели он запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони. Он ждет вашу доброту, так как к свадьбе дочери он должен подарить мебель. Он обещает погасить займ во время.
texts.en:
Kiyom is an educated and open-minded man.  Thanks to his parents, he was able to attend college, and all his life he has worked hard and honestly for the good of his own people.  He is now 50 years old.  He is married and has five children.  Since his wife is a homemaker, he is the main breadwinner in the family, although his older children are also working.

For the past five years he has been teaching at a high school and he is one of the best teachers there.  All his income is used to meet the needs of his family and therefore he is unable to save any money.  His daughter will soon get married, and he needs to give her a dowry.  Specifically, he would like to give her some furniture for her future house.  Kiyom and his daughter went to visit a furniture store, and his daughter showed him which furniture she would like to receive as a gift from him.  Kiyom cannot say no to her, although he doesn't have enough money to buy her expensive furniture.

Kiyom is requesting a loan of 2,500 somoni to buy some furniture.  He is relying on your kindness, since he is supposed to give furniture to his daughter before her wedding.  He promises to repay his loan on time.

loans.use: to buy furniture for his daughter.

loans.name: Suhrob

texts.ru: Сухробу 28 лет. Он холост и живет вместе с родителями, братом и сестрой. Его брат женатый и имеет детей. Однако его брат не в состоянии обеспечить свою семью и поэтому жена его брата собирается организовать свой бизнес шитьем женской одежды. Родители Сухроба пенсионеры и получают маленькую пенсию. Они просили Сухроба помочь брату и его жене для покупки швейной машинки. Сухроб более 3 года занимается услугой такси, и полученный доход использует для содержания семьи.  Он очень трудолюбивый и общительный человек и поэтому имеет своих постоянных клиентов, которых он привлекал в течение нескольких лет. Сухроб как добросовестный человек не смог отказаться просьбе родителей и обещал купить швейную машинку для жены брата, чтобы она могла организовать свой бизнес и таким образом получать доход для содержания детей. Сухроб запрашивает займ на сумму 2500 сомони для покупки швейной машинки. Он ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en:
Suhrob is 28 years old. He is single and lives with his parents, brother and sister. His brother is married with children. However, his brother is not in a position to provide for his family. As such, his brother's wife has decided to start her own business sewing women's clothing. 

Suhrob's parents live on their small pension. They have asked Suhrob to help his brother and sister-in-law buy a sewing machine. Suhrob has driven a taxi for more than 3 years, and uses that income to support his family. He is a very hardworking, friendly person, so he has attracted a number of regular clients over the last few years. 

As an honest person, Suhrob could not in good conscience refuse his parents' request. He has promised to buy a sewing machine for his brother's wife so that she can start her business and use it to support her children. Suhrob is requesting a loan of 2500 somoni for the purchase of a sewing machine. He awaits your kindness.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine for his sister-in-law

loans.name: Gabriela Del Socorro

texts.es: La joven Gabriela ahora es casada, su esposo trabaja como guarda de seguridad, continua viviendo en casa de sus padres, siempre le ha gustado el comercio para no depender de un salario, tiene un hijo de un año al que cuida con mucho amor y cariño comenta que en su embarazo tuvo muchas dificultades de salud pero gracias a Dios eso ya lo supero, Gabriela con este crédito solicitado piensa invertir en su negocio comprando ropa para bebe, cosméticos de adulto y de niño, accesorios para el cabello entre otros, su mayor deseo es que en un futuro pueda tener su propia casa.
texts.en:
Young Gabriela is now married. Her husband works as a security guard and she continues living in her parent’s house. She has always liked the idea of owning a business so that she does not have to rely on a salary. She has a one-year-old son whom she is raising with a great deal of love and affection. She notes she had health problems during her pregnancy however, with God’s help, she overcame them.

Gabriela will invest the loan she is requesting in her business. She will buy clothing for infants, beauty products for adults and children and hair accessories, among other items. Her greatest desire is that in the future she will be able to have her own house.

loans.use: to buy clothing for infants, beauty products for adults and children and hair accessories, among other items.

loans.name: Letty

texts.es:
Letty, de 27 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y dedicada, con muchas ganas de salir adelante con sus propios méritos. Es madre soltera, tiene una hija de 05 meses de edad. Juntos habitan cómodamente en la casa de sus padres.
La actividad que realiza Letty es la venta de bisutería. También se  servicio de manicure, actividades que realiza desde su casa donde cuenta con los materiales y accesorios necesarios, brindando una buena atención a sus clientes, estos oficios los aprendió de manera empírica viendo a otras amigas. 
Se inició hace más de 2 años con un préstamo de MFP, comprando sus materiales en pocas cantidades, luego viendo que aumentaba la demanda de sus servicios y productos, fue aumentando sus compras, y hasta el momento lo viene realizando sola.
Considera a su negocio rentable por las ganancias que le deja y lo solicitada que es por sus servicios y buen trabajo.
Decidió empezar con sus actividades debido al deseo de contar con sus propios ingresos y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos del hogar y sacar adelante a su familia.
Por tanto viendo los buenos resultados que está teniendo desea en un futuro abrir un salón de belleza en su casa, y poder atender con total comodidad a sus clientes. Por tanto éste será el préstamo número 02 con la institución MFP. Se siente agradecida y contenta de saber que contará con un apoyo financiero para concretar sus planes. Además comenta estar a gusto con su banco comunal por el buen trabajo que realizan apoyando a las personas. Con el monto solicitado 500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de materiales para la elaboración de bisuterías y también comprará implementos para realizar su trabajo.
texts.en:
Letty, 27, is a hardworking, dedicated woman who very much wants to get ahead by means of her own efforts.  She’s a single mother; she has a five-year-old daughter.  They live comfortably in her parents’ house.

Letty’s activity is selling costume jewelry and she also provides manicure services, activities she carries out at home where she has all the necessary supplies and accessories; she provides good customer service.  She learned these occupations empirically by watching her girlfriends.

She started more than two years ago with an MFP loan buying her materials in small amounts.  Later, seeing demand for her services and products increase, she increased her purchases and to date has been working alone.  She considers her business to be profitable because of the profits it nets and because her services are highly sought-after because of the good work she does.  She decided to start these activities because she wanted to earn her own income and help her parents with household expenses and to move her family forward.

Therefore, seeing the good results she’s having she wants in future to open a beauty salon at home to tend to customers with total comfort.  This will be MFP loan #2, then, and she feels grateful and happy to know that she will be able to count on financial support to make her plans reality.  She also comments that she feels good in her communal bank because of the good work the members are doing supporting people.  She will use the requested 500 new soles to buy supplies to make costume jewelry and also to buy work tools.

loans.use: to buy tools and costume jewelry making supplies.

loans.name: Julio Alfredo

texts.es:
JULIO ALFREDO tiene 25 años de edad es soltero tiene un hijo, vive con el hijo en casa de los padres en la ciudad de Ventans Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

JULIO ALFREDO se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas, patos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, insecticidas, abono orgánico, ranger.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras de maíz, arroz. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprar una casa. En el tiempo libre le gusta practicar el deporte.
texts.en:
Julio Alfredo is twenty-five years old, is single, and has one son.  He lives with his son in his parent's house in the city of Ventanas, in the province of Los Ríos.

The communal bank La Paulina is located in the Puerto Pechiche parish, in the district of La Paulina.  This area belongs to the Pueblo Viejo region.  The communal bank members make a living working in agriculture and livestock.

Julio Alfredo works in agriculture, particularly in growing corn and rice.  He also raises hens and ducks.  He is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, urea, manure , insecticide, organic fertilizer, and Ranger (a type of herbicide).

With the help of the loan, he will be able to buy what is necessary for planting the corn and rice.  All of the buying and selling he does in the city of Ventanas.  

His dream is to buy a house.  In his free time, he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, manure, insecticide, organic fertilizer, and Ranger (a type of herbicide).

loans.name: Josefa Benita

texts.es:
Josefa Benita habita en el Sauce, es un bello municipio rodeado de ríos caudalosos, montañas florecidas y lugares turísticos naturales que es el principal atractivo de la zona.

Josefa es una mujer de 53 años admirable que ha sido padre y madre para su hija a la cual le ha dado lo mejor que ha podido, sobre todo el pan de cada día y educación a través de su profesión como maestra de primaria la que ha ejercido la mitad de su vida.

Uno de sus mayores sueños es preparar a su hija profesionalmente para que sea una mujer de éxito en el futuro y por este motivo hace todo el sacrificio posible para apoyarle en todos los gastos universitarios, por tal razón está solicitando a los inversionistas de Kiva para que le financien un crédito a través de Ceprodel para pagar los aranceles de los módulos, el cual es un curso que se lleva acabo para obtener el título universitario ya que actualmente su hija ya terminó la carrera.

Confía en Dios que estas personas de buen corazón apoyen su solicitud para cumplir su sueño tan abnegado, ya que personas de escasos recursos que ganan tan poco como es su caso necesitan apoyo.
texts.en:
Josefa Benita lives in el Sauce; it is a beautiful town surrounded by mighty rivers, flourishing mountains, and natural touristic sights, which are the main attraction of the area.  

Josefa is a forty-three-year-old woman, and is admirable since she has been both the father and mother for her daughter.  She has given her daughter the best she could; above all, her daily bread and an education, since Josefa is a primary school teacher.  She has exercised this profession for half her life.  

One of her greatest dreams is to prepare her daughter professionally, in order to be a successful woman in the future.  For this reason, she makes all the sacrifices possible in order to support her in all her university expenses.  

Therefore, she is asking the Kiva investors to finance her loan through Ceprodel in order to pay the final fees for a course that will allow her daughter to get her university degree finalized.  At this time, her daughter has actually already finished her career studies.

She trusts in God that these people of good heart will help her reach her very selfless dream; people with scarce resources that gain little, as in her case, need support.

loans.use: to pay the fees in order to get her daughter's university degree finalized.

loans.name: Carlos Gerald

texts.es:
El joven Carlos Gerald es un joven de 31 años, felizmente casado con un hijo, desde muy pequeño ha sido bien aplicado y estudioso apasionado por los números, por ese motivo eligió estudiar la carrera de matemáticas y hoy en la actualidad se desempeña como maestro de secundaria en un colegio del área rural al norte del municipio de El Sauce.

Para cumplir con su horario de entrada se levanta a las 5 am para poder tomar el autobús que dura dos horas para llegar a la comarca donde imparte clases sobre todo a niños de escasos recursos que muchas veces no tienen para un par de zapatos.

Todo esto que vive a diario en su colegio lo reflexiona para ser un padre cada día mejor y que no le falte el pan de cada día a su familia ni el amor de padre para su hijo algo que a él le hizo falta, sin embargo esto no ha sido un obstáculo para luchar y tratar de cumplir  sus sueños.

Con su bajo salario ha hecho lo posible para tener una vivienda digna con condiciones adecuadas, hoy en la actualidad está solicitando un crédito a Kiva para repellar las paredes con el fin de mayor seguridad con el cual comprará materiales de construcción como cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra.
Ruega a Kiva y Ceprodel que le brinden apoyo  para llevar a cabo su objetivo ya que solo así se pueden cumplir los sueños de las personas pobres.
texts.en:
Carlos Gerard is a young man of 31. He is happily married and has a son. Since he was very little, he has been industrious and studious and passionate about numbers. For this reason, he chose to study the mathematics curriculum, and now he works as a secondary teacher in a school in a rural area to the north of the town of El Sauce.

To arrive at school at his starting time, he gets up at 5 am to be able to catch the bus, which takes two hours to arrive in the district where he gives classes, mainly to children of scarce resources who many times do not have a pair of shoes.

He thinks about everything he experiences daily at his school in order to be a better father every day and to see that his family does not lack daily sustenance or the love of a father for his son, something that he lacked. Nevertheless, this was not an obstacle for his striving and trying to accomplish his dreams.

With his low salary he has done what is possible to have a worthy home in adequate condition. Now he is applying for a loan from Kiva to plaster the walls with the goal of better security. He will use the loan to buy construction materials such as cement and sand and pay for labor.

He requests that Kiva and Ceprodel offer him support to complete his goal, since only this way can the dreams of poor people be accomplished.

loans.use: to buy cement and sand and pay for labor.

loans.name: La Colonia Group

texts.es: Edgar tiene 42 años de edad es soltero y desde niño le gustó trabajar como mecánico, dice que le llamaba la atención el ver como arreglaban los carros y es por eso que se metió a trabajar desde los 12 años para poder ganar su propio dinero y así poder ayudar en los gastos de su casa. Él es parte del grupo llamado La Colonia y dice que es la primera vez que trabaja con una financiera, comenta que está pidiendo un crédito para la compra de refacciones ya que tiene su taller en su casa y que arregla todo tipo de automóviles, dice que el va hasta la Ciudad de México a comprar las refacciones de los vehículos por que allá le salen mas económicos. Edgar espera que le vaya muy bien con su crédito ya que mejorará su pequeña refaccionaria pues la tendrá mejor surtida. Sus otros 8 compañeros de grupo se llaman, Lourdes, María Guadalupe, Maribel, Martha, Laura, Mayra, Nancy y Amparo ellas invertirán en una maderería, en antojitos mexicanos, artículos para surtir tienda de abarrotes, venta por catalogo zapatos y ropa, refaccionaria. Florería, cocina económica y venta de frutas y legumbres.
texts.en:
Edgar is 42 years old and single. As a child he liked working as a mechanic. He says what drew his attention was how they repaired the cars and that's why he began working at 12 years old to earn his own money and to be able to help with household expenses.

He is part of the group called "La Colonia" (The Colony) and he says it is their first time working with a financial institution. He is asking for a loan to buy spare parts. He has his workshop in his home and fixes all kinds of automobiles. He says that the runs to Mexico city to buy replacement parts are more economical. Edgar hopes to do very well with this loan since it will improve his stock of auto parts.

His other 8 group members are: Lourdes, María Guadalupe, Maribel, Martha, Laura, Mayra, Nancy and Amparo. They invested in a lumberyard, a Mexican snack shop, grocery store stock, shoe and clothing catalog sales, a repair shop, a florist, an economical kitchen, and the sale of fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy different spare parts for vehicles.

loans.name: Las Amistosas Group

texts.es:
Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Las Amistosas

Betty es una de las socias del grupo, ella  tiene 41años, es separada con 02 hijos. Betty empezó su propio negocio hace 04 años, su fascinación por la buena comida la llevo a iniciar su propio negocio de comidas con algunos ahorros  alquilo un local donde empezó su restaurante allí vende platos a la carta y menú, los clientes que atiende son trabajadores de la zona y comerciantes del lugar, también tiene un salón de belleza donde trabaja personal contratado por ella. Betty se siente muy feliz por todo lo que ha logrado y porque puede darles a sus hijos una buena educación, en el futuro desea tener sus propios locales, el préstamo solicitado lo utilizara para alquilar otro local para poder ampliar su restaurante, debido a la afluencia de comensales que aumentan cada día.
Betty está muy agradecida a los Inversionistas KIVA que lo hacen posible su prestamo
Betty  es la ultima de la derecha viste casaca azul y polo verde, tambien se añadio la foto de susan.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru!  This is Las Amistosas group.

Betty, 41, is one of the members of the group.  She's separated and has two children.  Betty started her own business four years ago.  Her fascination for good food drove her to start her own food business with some savings.  She rented a place and started her restaurant, where she sells a la carte dishes and set menus.  Her customers are workers and merchants in the area.  She also has a beauty salon where she hires people to work.

Betty's very happy about everything she has achieved because she can give her children a good education.  She wants to have her own stores in the future.

She's going to use the loan requested to rent another place to be able to expand her restaurant because the large number of diners increases every day.  Betty's very grateful to the Kiva lenders who make her loan possible.

Betty's the last one on the right; she's wearing a blue jacket and a green polo shirt.  Also, the photo of Susan was added.

loans.use: to rent restaurant space

loans.name: Ivette Maribel

texts.es:
Ivette es una mujer de 29 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su hija, a quien ama y es su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su hija, ya que ella es madre y padre para ella; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Ivette no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta cocina, en especial cocina una riquísima Carapulcra para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Ivette trabaja como niñera, brindando servicios de cuidados a pequeños, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 5 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por los buenos cuidados y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Ivette se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá cubrir los gastos de estudios preuniversitarios que su hija necesita, de esta manera Ivette ayudar a su hija para que tenga una mejor educación y preparación, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia y ver a su hija convertida en una buena profesional.
texts.en:
Ivette, 29, lives in the city of Ica with her daughter, whom she loves and who is her main motivation in life.  She's a very friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic woman who puts all her effort into getting her daughter ahead, because she's both mother and father to her.  Unfortunately, because of a lack of financial resources and the need to work, Ivette wasn't able to study for a profession, but she very much would like to have done so.  In her spare time she likes to cook, especially a rich Carapulcra [a spicy stew] to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with a lot of effort and dedication, Ivette offers child care services.  She works every day from early in the morning and can do it for approximately five hours.  She feels comfortable doing her job and believes it's going well for her because of her good care and friendly customer service.

Ivette's very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she'll be able to cover the expenses for the college prep studies her daughter needs.  This way Ivette will help her daughter have a better education and preparation, and she'll continue working and making the effort to achieve her big dream of having her own house and seeing her daughter become a good professional.

loans.use: to cover her daughter's educational expenses

loans.name: Teresita

texts.en:
Teresita is engaged in a general store business in her village in the remote area of Cabisera 25, province of Isabela. She has been in the retailing business for five years. Teresita started her business when her eldest child enrolled in college. She believes that her business could support the educational needs of her children. She wants her business to progress in order to increase her income and sustain the needs of her family. 

Teresita wants to borrow PHP 10,000 as additional business capital for her general store. She will use it to buy snack foods, spices, and canned goods for her store. She hopes that her loan request will be granted because it would really be of great help in maintaining the growth of her business. 

Teresita is 45 years old and is married to Marcos, a farmer. They have four children.

loans.use: to buy snack foods, spices, and canned goods for her store

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is 45 years old and is married with five children. She has worked in her vegetable vending business for two years to generate income. Evelyn also has been running a sari-sari (variety) store for almost one year. She wants to improve more her business, but she lacks the necessary capital to do so. 

Evelyn is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 to buy cabbages, eggplant, squash, and string beans and also to buy grocery items for her sari-sari store. She believes that through her patience and hard work her family will survive poverty.

loans.use: to buy cabbages, eggplant, squash, and string beans and also to buy grocery items for her sari-sari store

loans.name: Faasoesa

texts.en: Faasoesa is a 55-year-old married woman with five children. She would like to start growing taro, banana, yams, and taamu to earn a living. Faasoesa has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives, a spade, etc. She will use her profits to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives, a spade, etc.

loans.name: Leiu

texts.en: Leiu is a 54-year-old married woman with five children. She would like to start growing cucumbers, peas, cabbages, tomatoes, and pumpkins to earn a living. Leiu has requested a loan to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives, and a spade for her business. She will use her profits to expand her business in the future.

loans.use: to buy chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives, and a spade

loans.name: Neli

texts.en:
Neli is a 31-year-old, married woman, who has four children. She would like to start growing taro, bananas, yams and taamu to earn a living. Neli has requested a loan to buy items she needs for growing those crops, like chemicals, a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades.

Neli will spend her profits to extend her business and save for her children's school fees.

loans.use: to buy inputs and tools for farming, like a weed sprayer, bush knives and spades

loans.name: Eugenia

texts.en:
Eugenia is from Villalin, Pana-on, Misamis Occidental. She is a widow at age 36, and she has three children. To make a living, Eugenia plants and harvests fruits and vegetables for sale. Eugenia has engaged in her business for five years and earns 3,000 PHP a month for these activities. 

Eugenia joined GDMPC in 2010. She is requesting a loan of 5,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase fertilizers, such as manure, for her crops. She plans to use the additional profit generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers, such as manure, for her crops.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 58 years old and a responsible father who is raising his family in a rural community. He aims to raise their living standards to give his family a better life. Aside from farming, Richard also engages in buying and selling of dried fish in the market to generate additional income. Through this business, he has been able to generate income that he uses for his family's daily needs and some of which he saves for their future. 

Richard had planned to improve his business and make it more profitable. Due to insufficient capital, he is asking for a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy additional stock of dried fish, fruits, and vegetables for resale. Richard believes that this financial assistance will help him improve his business and he is hoping that he will be successful and financially stable in the future.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of dried fish, fruits, and vegetables for resale

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.en: Zenaida is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP as additional capital for her general store business. Having the requested amount will enable her to continuously manage her store and develop it. Zenaida would like her business to survive so that she can help her family with the difficulties of life. Zenaida is 52 years old and lives in the distant village of Cabisera 25 in the province of Isabela. She is married to Domingo, a farmer. They have four children, some of whom are still studying, while some are unable to pursue their studies due to a lack of money. She is hoping that some of them can finish their studies in the future.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, candies, cooking oil, vinegar and noodles for her store.

loans.name: Concordia

texts.en:
Concordia is 47 years old, married, and has two children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Concordia has a general store business in the Philippines. Concordia requested a PHP 11,000 loan through NWTF to purchase snack foods, noodles, sugar, soap and other miscellaneous items.

Concordia has been in this business for four years. She dreams to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase snack foods, noodles, sugar, soap and other miscellaneous items

loans.name: Roena

texts.en:
Roena is from Villalin, Pana-on, Misamis Occidental. She is 43 years old, married, and has two children. To make a living, Roena has operated a general store for 13 years. She earns 8,000 PHP a month. 

In 2010, Roena joined GDMPC. Now Roena is requesting a loan of 20,000 PHP, which she will use to buy items to sell in her store, such as shampoo, soap and toothpaste. She plans to use the additional profit generated by the business, to improve and expand her business.

loans.use: to buy items to sell in her store, such as shampoo, soap and toothpaste.

loans.name: Tessie

texts.en: Tessie is from Tabo-o, Jimenez. She is 36 years old, married, and has 2 children. To make a living, she makes and sells food. She has been in her food vending business for 3 years and earns about 4,000 PHP a month for these activities. In 2011, she joined GDMPC. Tessie is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP, which will be used to purchase the ingredients needed to make food to sell. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to supplement her family's income.

loans.use: To purchase the ingredients needed to make food to sell

loans.name: Nerita

texts.en:
Nerita is 32 years old, married, and has two school-aged children. She runs a small variety store in her community to help her husband in generating income for their family. She and her husband aim to improve their standard of living and to educate their children and give them a bright future. 

To improve her business, Nerita planned to increase her product offerings to satisfy her customers' demand. Due to inadequate capital, she is asking for a loan of PHP 40,000 to buy additional stock of soft drinks, junk foods, beverages, seasonings, and vegetables for resale. Despite difficulties in life, Nerita has the determination to improve her business. She is hoping that her patience and sacrifices will bear fruit someday.

loans.use: to buy additional stock of soft drinks, junk foods, beverages, seasonings, and vegetables for resale

loans.name: Elvie

texts.en:
Elvie, age 30, is married and has three children. She is from Mitugas, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. Elvie manages a general store for a living. The work gives her a total monthly income of PHP 4,500. In 2010, she joined GDMPC. 

Elvie has requested a loan of PHP 12,000 from the cooperative to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee for her store. She hopes to use a portion of her earnings for maintenance costs and to expand her current offerings.

loans.use: to purchase additional products like canned goods, noodles, sugar, and coffee for her store.

loans.name: Palolo

texts.en:
Palolo is 40 years old, married, and has six children. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas, and yams, which she can sell in her community or at the market, with her children's help. She has been doing this for two years. 

Palolo needs a loan to buy more tools and inputs for agriculture, like a new wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush knives, a weedkiller spray and more tiapula (taro for planting). She is a new member of SPBD, having joined in 2012. Palolo will use the profits from her sales to increase her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy more tools and inputs for farming, like a wheelbarrow, shovel, and weedkiller spray.

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is 30 years old, married, and lives with her husband and two school-aged children in the province of Isabela. She is a very devoted mother and she works hard at providing motorcycle services. She tries to ensure that her passengers are comfortable on the road and arrive on time. 

Irene is applying for a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy spare parts for her motorcycle, including new tires. She dreams of earning enough money to repair and improve her house so that her children will have a more comfortable life.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for her motorcycle, including new tires.

loans.name: Nolie

texts.en:
Hog-raising is the primary source of income for Nolie. He is 45 years old and is married to Arsenia. The couple is thankful because they had been blessed with three children. Nolie is recognized as a responsible father. He says he will do everything to raise his family from poor living. 

Nolie wants to buy more hogs to raise. For this reason, he is asking for a loan in the amount of PHP 35,000 to buy additional hogs to raise and feed for them. Nolie hopes to grow and expand his business to secure his family's future.

loans.use: to buy additional hogs to raise and feed for them

loans.name: Faupo

texts.en:
Faupo is 64 years old and single with no children. She bakes and sells pancakes in her community for a living. She has five years of experience in this kind of business. 

Faupo has requested a loan to buy flour, sugar, yeast, plastic bags, and a gas oven with dripping oil for her business. Faupo is a new member of SPBD. She joined in 2012 to gain access to financial services. In the future, she plans to build her family assets.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, a frying pan, yeast, dripping oil, plastic bags, a gas oven, etc.

loans.name: Leitisia

texts.en:
Leitisia is 32 years old and single. She has one child. She has a small garden where she grows taro, bananas, and yams, which she can sell in her community or at the market. She has been doing this for two years.

Leitisia needs a loan to buy a new wheelbarrow, a shovel, a rake, some bush knives, a weedkiller spray and some tiapula (taro for planting). She is a new member of SPBD, having joined in 2012. Leitisia will use the profits from her business to increase her family's assets.

loans.use: to buy more tools and inputs for growing taro, bananas and yams, like a wheelbarrow, some bush knives, and tiapula.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora

texts.es: Doña María Auxiliadora tiene una licenciatura en comercio internacional pero se le dificulto trabajar porque no tenía quien le cuide a sus hijos ya que sus familiares están fuera del país, pero con su propio negocio le es más fácil ya que ella sola planifica su horario y esta mas al pendiente de sus hijos, así mantiene su hogar siendo una madre soltera, solicita este crédito para invertir en su negocio en vista de que tiene mucha demanda de su clientela, surtirá comprando perfumes, ropa interior para damas y caballeros, ella vende al crédito y al contado a trabajadores de distintas empresas en un futuro espera tener su negocio en la comodidad de su hogar y acaparar mayor clientela para apoyar más a su familia.
texts.en:
Ms. María Auxiliadora has a degree in international business.  It was difficult for her to work because she did not have anyone to look after her children since her family is out of the country.  With her own business, it is easier for her since she alone plans her schedule and she is more devoted to her children.  Being a single mother, this is the way she maintains her household.

She requests this loan to invest in her business since she a lot of customer demand.  She will buy perfume, men and women's underwear.  She accepts cash or credit and she sells to workers of different businesses.  In the future, she hopes to have her business in the comfort of her home and to gain more clients in order to support her family.

loans.use: to buy perfume, men and women's underwear.

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.en:
For the past 11 years, Trinidad has been selling baked snack foods in her local community, to earn a living. Trinidad is 57 years old, married, and has four children. She is from Mitugas, Tudela, Misamis Occidental. She earns 2,500 PHP a month from her work.

Trinidad joined GDMPC in 2011. She is requesting a 5,000 PHP loan to purchase the ingredients she needs to make baked snacks to sell. She plans to use the income generated with her loan, to expand her business and save for her future.

loans.use: to purchase more of the ingredients she needs to make baked snack foods to sell.

loans.name: Joelisa

texts.en: Joelisa is 45 years old, married and has seven children. Three of her children are in school. She works very hard to provide for them. Joelisa runs a general store in the Philippines and requested an 11,000 Philippine peso loan through NWTF to purchase more groceries to sell. Joelisa has been in this business for 26 years and sells a variety of items such as soap, rice, sugar and other groceries. In the future, Joelisa would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Jaihuayco - 32 Group

texts.es: El Banco de emprendimiento JAIHUAYCO - 32 está  compuesto por diez integrantes ocho mujeres y dos varones,  la presidenta del  banco es la Sra. Verónica tiene 31 años, ella es casada  y tiene 2 hijos que son de las edades de 10 y 12  años,  la Sra. Verónica se dedica a la venta de DVDs de música  en su tienda de venta que se encuentra en su misma casa que está en la zona de Samaritano,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Sra. Verónica va a usar este préstamo para invertir en la compra de álbunes de música, ya que esta época es de mucha demanda, la Sra. Verónica enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la falta de efectivo para la compra de estos productos y va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando variedad de productos según la temporada para vender, su deseo para su negocio es crecer más y ayudar a su familia, ya que esta es la actividad con la que mantiene a su familia.
texts.en: The entrepreneurial bank Jaihuayco - 32 consists of 10 members, eight women and two men. The president of the bank is Señora Veronica, who is 31. She is married and has two children, ages 10 and 12. She sells music DVDs in her store, which is located in her own house, which is in the Samaritano zone. This loan is her first from this institution. Señora Veronica is going to use this loan to invest in the purchase of music albums, since they are in much demand at this time of year. She faces challenges in her business, particularly the lack of cash to buy these products. She is going to use the profits to continue buying a variety of products to sell according to the season. Her wish for her business is to grow more and help her family, since this is the activity with which she supports her family.

loans.use: to buy music albums to sell

loans.name: Doctresa

texts.en: Doctresa is 38 years old, a goal-oriented and hardworking woman. For more than 8 years she has been buying and selling crabs in their community. She has seen a small improvement to their financial situation. She is very thankful for having this business. It helps her a lot in improving their living situation. Now, she is asking for a loan of 15,000 to buy more crabs to sell not only in their community but also to their neighboring municipality. This amount, she says, will surely bring great improvement to her income.

loans.use: to buy more crabs to sell

loans.name: Norma Elizabeth

texts.es:
Norma es una mujer de condicion humilde pero con muchas ganas de salir adelante, sobre todo porque es madre de 2 peequeños a quienes quiere mucho y cada dia lucha con todas sus fuerzas para poder brindarles una mejor calidad de vida y sobre todo ofrecerles todo lo que ella no pudo tener de niña. Norma logro estudiar la carrera de educacion pero como no pudo encontrar empleo actualmente trabaja en una granja, pero Norma luego de algunos mese logro ahorra y tiene un pequeño negocio de venta de ropa; ella cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es responsable y tambien tiene muchas ganas de mejorar cada día.

Norma esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva, porque gracias al apoyo que le han brindado ella podra comprar una vitrina para su negocio de venta de ropa, de esta manera podra exhibir sus productos de mejor manera ya que colocara la vitrina en un pequeño espacio que Norma a acondicionado en su vivienda y asi podra mejorar sus ingresos y seguira luchando por hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Darle una profesion a sus hijos y tener un local propio para su negocio".
texts.en:
Norma is a woman who lives under humble conditions but with a great desire to get ahead, above all because she is the mother of two little ones whom she loves very much.  Each day she puts forth all of her efforts to provide them a better quality of life and above all give them the things that she wasn’t able to get as a child.  After having studied for a career in teaching, Norma was not able to find work and currently works on a farm.  After a few months she was able to start a small clothing sales business.  She believes that she is getting ahead because she is responsible and has a great desire to improve each day.

Norma is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help she has been able to buy a display case for her clothing sale business.  In this way she will be able to show her products in a better way.  She will place her display case in an area she has set up.  In this way she will be able to improve her income and continue working toward making her dreams a reality, “Provide a profession for her children and have her own shop.”

loans.use: to buy a display case

loans.name: Kamilia

texts.ru: Камилия 27 лет, замужем. У нее замечательнейшие две дочки.Камилия активно развивает фермерское хозяйство. На сегодня, в хозяйстве Камилия имеется развитое хозяйство, начатое в 2000 году с 20,000 KGS, на сегодняшний день ежемесячные доходы от продажи молока и молочных продуктов составляют примерно 15,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Камилия обратилась в компанию «Бай –Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на закуп 2дойные коровы для для увеличения доходов от продажи молока. Доходы от кредита Камилия планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение хозяйства.
texts.en:
Kamilia is 27 years old and married.  She has two beautiful daughters.  She is actively involved in the development of her farming business.  Today, Kamilia's business is in full expansion: while she started it in 2000 with an initial capital of 20,000 KGS, her monthly earnings from the sale of milk and dairy products now amount to approximately 15,000 som (KGS).

In order to further develop her business, Kamilia has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) for the purchase of two dairy cows.  This loan will allow her to increase the income she makes from the sale of milk.

Kamilia plans to invest the earnings from her loan into further expanding her agricultural business.

loans.use: to purchase two dairy cows.

loans.name: Nelson Agustin

texts.es:
NELSON AGUSTIN tiene 33 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene cuatro hijos, vive con los hijos y con la esposa en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia d elos ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

NELSON AGUSTIN  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, ranger, dos gallinas y un cerdo.

Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras y los animales. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es tener un terreno y una casa. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es comprarce un carro. En el tiempo libre le gusta asistir a la iglesia.
texts.en:
Nelson Agustin, 33, is married and has 4 children. He lives with his wife and kids in the city of Ventanas in the province of Los Rios.

The lending group "La Paulina" is located in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, the precinct of La Paulina. It belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo, where the inhabitants are farmers and cattlemen. 

Nelson Agustin is a farmer, planting corn and rice. He also raises hens and pigs. He asks for a loan to buy seeds, urea, compost, weedkiller, 2 hens and a pig. With the help from this loan he will be able to buy the things he needs for his planting and the animals. He makes his purchases and sales in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to have a piece of land and a house. A challenge that he is facing is buying himself a car. In his free time he likes to go to church.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, compost, weedkiller, two hens and a pig.

loans.name: Gerardo Leonel

texts.es:
GERARDO LEONEL tiene 21 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en la ciudad de Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

GERARDO LEONEL  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, además se dedica a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, ranger, polvillo, morocho.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá mejorar los sembríos y la cosecha. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarse un lote de terreno y una casa. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es comprarce una casa y tener una linda familia. En el tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Gerardo Leonel, 21, is single and does not have any children. He lives with his parents in the city of Ventanas, province of Los Rios.

The lending club La Paulina is  in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, in the zone of La Paulina. It belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo, where the inhabitants work in farming and cattle. 

Gerardo Leonel is a farmer who plants corn and rice, as well as raising hens and pigs. He asks for a loan to buy seeds, urea, compost, weedkiller, and rice- and corn-based animal feed. With the help of the loan he will be able to improve his plantings and his harvest. He will make his purchases and sales in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a piece of land and a house. The challenges he is faced with are buying a house and having a nice family. In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, compost, weedkiller, and rice- and corn-based animal feed.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es: La Sra. Mary sigue con la misma actividad de la venta de productos de primera necesidad en su tienda de barrio, cuenta que le fue bien con el anterior crédito que lo utilizo en la compra de mercadería, ahora en esta ocasión solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como abarrotes  para surtir su tienda de barrio, ya que incremento su clientela y por ende sus ganancias y desea brindar variedad de productos a su clientela.
texts.en: Mary continues with her work of selling basic goods in her neighborhood store. She says that the previous loan went well, being used for merchandise. Now she asks for a loan to buy merchandise like groceries to stock her corner store, since her clientele has increased along with her profits, and she wants to give her customers a variety of products.

loans.use: to buy groceries, sugar and noodles to stock her neighborhood store.

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
JOSE LUIS tiene 23 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive en casa con los padres en Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

La VRC LA PAULINA, se encuentra ubicada en la Parroquia Puerto Pechiche Recinto la Paulina, Pertenece al Cantón Pueblo Viejo se dedican a labores Agrícolas y Pecuarias.

JOSE LUIS se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, abonos, insecticidas, abono orgánico, ranger.

 Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para las siembras. Las compras y ventas lo hace  en la ciudad de Ventanas.

El sueño es comprarce una moto. Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es sembrar una cuadra de cacao. En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar indor con los amigos.
texts.en:
Jose Luis, 23, is single and does not have any children. He lives with his parents in Ventanas, in the province of Los Rios.

The lending club La Paulina is located in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, in the zone of La Paulina. It belongs to the canton of Pueblo Viejo, where the people work in farming and cattle. 

Jose Luis is a farmer, planting corn and rice. He asks for a loan to buy seeds, urea, manure, insecticides, compost, and weedkiller. With the help of the loan he will be able to buy the things he needs for planting. He will make his purchases and sales in the city of Ventanas.

His dream is to buy a motorcycle. His challenge is planting a section of cacao. In his free time he likes to play indoor soccer with his friends.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, manure, insecticides, compost, and weedkiller.

loans.name: Carolyn

texts.en:
This is Carolyn, 43, resident of Payatas, Philippines. She is married to Arnel, a driver, and is a mother. She, together with her husband, manages their household while operating a business. At this time, she is working hard to continually provide income for their everyday expenses.

Carolyn operates a junk shop. Trash is not actively segregated in the Philippines, and while waiting for their local dump trucks, people scavenge garbage dumps and trash bags for recyclable materials like metal, copper, plastic, paper and other materials. They sell these to junk shops for a little profit. Junk shops then stack, clean, and gather huge quantities of these materials and sell them back to foundries like factories and others of the like. Aside from this she also raises pigs in her compound. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. She earns a minimum of PHP 1000 in sales every day.

To help her continue operations of her business, she is requesting a PHP 12000 loan. She will be incorporating the loan into her current revolving fund used to buy recyclable materials from collectors. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

Carolyn dreams of having a vehicle that will be used in her business and hopes to have their own house and lot. She faithfully meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week and where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Microfinance loans.

loans.use: To pay for recyclable materials from collectors needed in her business.

loans.name: Agostina

texts.en: Agostina is 45 years old and has been engaged in a piggery business as a source of income. She patiently does this activity because of her child who is currently studying. She wants to increase her proceeds in order to save for the education expenses, but suffers from insufficiency of capital. In connection with this, she is requesting a loan of 15,000 PHP (Philippines pesos) to purchase feeds and vitamins for her hog. She just hopes that her loan will be beneficial to her business and to her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase feeds and vitamins for her hog.

loans.name: Gilma De Jesús

texts.es:
Gilma de Jesús es una Sauceña, luchadora y a pesar de habitar en una comarca rural al sur del municipio de El Sauce se ha esforzado por sacar adelante a sus tres hijos haciendo lo posible para que sean personas de bien y que estudien sacrificándose para mandarlos a la escuela a diario hasta el poblado del Sauce a 10 km de distancia, ya que en dicha comarca no hay escuelas.

Con el fin de generar ingresos y ayudarle a su esposo optó por iniciar un pequeño negocio con capital obsequiado por él hace 19 años donde consiste en vender ropa y zapatos de manera ambulante.

Su día es bien agitado inicia a las 5 am para preparar a sus hijos para la escuela y luego agarra la carretera para visitar casa por casa ofreciendo sus productos en los caseríos aledaños a su lugar y así poder vender.

Como se acerca la temporada de inicio de clases necesita capital para invertir en ropa y zapatos escolares por ese motivo solicita a los inversionistas de kiva y Ceprodel que le financien un préstamos para comprar pantalones, blusas, ropa interior y sábanas y así satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Gilma de Jesús is from El Sauce, she is a fighter and despite living in a rural area south of the municipality of El Sauce, she has strived to get her three children ahead. She does her best to see her children being good people and studying. She is making sacrifices in order to send them to school every day to the town of El Sauce, which is 10 km away, because there are no schools in this region.

In order to generate income and help her husband, she decided to start a small business with a capital he gave her 19 years ago. It consists in selling clothes and shoes as a street vendor. Her day is very busy, she starts at 5 am to prepare her children for school and then she takes the road offering her products door to door in the group of houses close to her place in order to sell. 

The start of school season is close and she needs capital to invest in school clothes and shoes. For this reason she is asking to Kiva investors and Ceprodel to fund a loan to buy pants, blouses, underwear, and sheets, so she can meet her customers demand.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses, underwear and sheets.

loans.name: Elva

texts.es:
Elva, de 34 años de edad, es una mujer con mucha ganas de salir adelante y brindarse una mejor calidad de vida. Esta casada con Rosendo quien es marino mercante. Juntos viven cómodamente en su casa propia. La actividad que tiene Elva es la venta de artículos de ferretería en general como tubos, pegamentos, fierros, etc. Para eso cuenta con un local que instalo en el interior de su vivienda. Todas sus mercaderías las trae desde la capital y las vende a precios competitivos logrando ganarse la preferencia de sus clientes quienes la recomiendan  con otras personas, logrando hacer crecer su clientela, siendo su tienda muy concurrida.
Se inició hace más de05 años por idea de su pareja y contando con un capital propio, cuenta con el apoyo de su pareja para la atención de los clientes  en sus tiempos libres.
Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tienen sus productos por los precios justos que oferta.
Antes de iniciar su negocio no contaba con ingresos propios, por eso decidió contar con un oficio y genéraselos, de esa manera también apoyaría a su pareja en realizar sus planes de comprar su propia casa.
Por tanto viendo los buenos resultados, desea en un futuro aumentar la cantidad de su mercadería y ampliar su local.  Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Por otro lado se compromete una vez más de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarias
Con  el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles los invertirá en la comprar de artículos de ferretería al por mayor así tendrá un stock disponible para la venta. Desea conseguir  precios más cómodos por sus compras en volumen y contar con mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
Elva, who is 34 years old, is a woman with many hopes to get ahead and afford a better quality of life. She is married to Rosendo, who is a merchant sailor. They live together comfortably in their own house. Elva’s work is selling general hardware products, like pipes, glue, iron, etc. For this, she uses a shop that she set up inside her home. 

She brings all of her merchandise from the capital and sells it at competitive prices. She succeeds in earning her customers’ preference, who recommend her to other people. This makes her customer base grow, being a very busy store.

She feels that her business is profitable enough because of the demand for her products, due to the fair prices that she offers. Before starting her business, she didn’t have her own income. Therefore, she decided to get a job and earn one. In this way, she would support her spouse in carrying out their plans to purchase their own house.

From seeing the good results, she hopes in the future to increase the amount of merchandise and expand her shop. For this, she is waiting for a contribution so that she can make her plans. On the other hand, she is committed once again to complying with the payment of her quotas, as with previous loans that she had. In addition, she is grateful to be part of her communal bank, because all of the members are people who are responsible and very caring.

With the requested loan of 1000 nuevos soles, she will invest in the purchase of wholesale hardware products in order to have stock available for sale. She hopes to get more suitable prices for her bulk purchases and to have better earnings.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale hardware products in order to have stock available for sale.

loans.name: Rema

texts.en: Rema, 39, is responsible for her family. She patiently sells Avon products plus operates her piggery business. Her husband works as a farmer in the village. They both work hard to support their needs. Rema said that she will do everything to lift her family out of poverty, and that is why she is also engaged in two kinds of businesses. Rema is requesting a loan of PHP 15,000 to purchase Avon products such as makeup and underwear and feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs. She hopes that she can get the amount she has requested to further develop her business.

loans.use: to purchase Avon products such as makeup and underwear and to purchase feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs

loans.name: Lucy

texts.es:
Lucy es una mujer de  36 años, vive en la ciudad de Pucallpa con su esposo y sus tres hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, ella es una persona muy amable, trabajadora y entusiasta, que junto con su esposo dedican todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a su familia; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar Lucy no pudo estudiar la carrera profesional de Administración que deseaba, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta limpiar su vivienda y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Picadillo de Paiche para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Lucy trabaja brindando servicios de afiliado de discos de aserrar, adicionalmente alquila una mototaxi a diversos choferes para que brinden servicios de transporte, ella trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, ella se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su esfuerzo y por el trato amable que brinda a sus clientes.
Lucy se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de madera, clavos, calaminas y pintura, ya que al acercarse la época de lluvia desea hacer el mejoramiento de su vivienda, de esta manera podrá brindar mayor seguridad y bienestar para su familia, así pues ella seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de ver a sus hijos convertidos en buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Lucy is a 36-year-old woman who lives in the city of Pucallpa with her husband and their three children. She loves her family dearly and they are her main reason for living. Lucy is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person. She and her husband dedicate all of their efforts to helping their family get ahead. Unfortunately, due to the lack of financial resources and the need to work, Lucy was not able to pursue a professional management degree as she would have liked. In her free time, she enjoys cleaning her house. On a few occasions, she prepares a delicious dish of “picadillo de paiche” (a minced fish stew) to share with her family.

Through her own initiative and with great effort and dedication, Lucy offers services by filing saw blades. She also rents out a motorcycle taxi to different drivers who provide transportation services. Lucy begins her day in the early morning hours and is able to work approximately 10 hours each day. She enjoys her work and believes she is doing well because of her efforts and the friendly treatment she provides to her customers.

Lucy is extremely grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, she will be able to buy wood, nails, corrugated iron sheets, and paint. Since the rainy season is approaching, she would like to make improvements to her home so that she can provide more security and greater well-being for her family. Lucy will continue working and striving to achieve her greatest wish of seeing her children become successful professionals.

loans.use: to buy construction materials for home improvements.

loans.name: Trinidad Teresa

texts.es:
Trinidad Teresa tiene 50 años de edad de estado civil actual soltera tiene cuatro hijos, vive con los hijos en el Cantón ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Trinidad Teresa se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandu, además se dedica a la críanza de cerdos y pollos. Las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas. 

Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos, urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, líquido mata maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos. El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá comprar los abonos, semillas sin ningún tipo de problema.

Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta son las plagas cómo el cogollero, el ratón que dañan los cultivos. El sueño es  comprar terreno. En el tiempo libre le gusta escuchar música.
texts.en:
Trinidad Teresa is 50 years old, single, and has four children. She lives with her children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Dulce Sentimiento” (Sweet Sentiment) is located in the neighborhood of Caimito II in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of the Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Trinidad Teresa is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. In addition, she raises pigs and chickens. Her purchases and sales are conducted in the canton of Ventanas. Trinidad is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, farming supplies, urea, weed killer, and fertilizers. This loan will be very helpful because she can buy these supplies without any problems. The challenges she faces include dealing with pests, such as army worms (a type of caterpillar that feeds on corn). Her dream is to buy a plot of land.

In her free time, Trinidad Teresa enjoys listening to music.

loans.use: to buy seeds, farming supplies, urea, weed killer, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Dina

texts.en: Dina, 25, is married and has two children. She operates a sari-sari store as a source of income, while her husband is in farming. She tried to learn this work because of the poor living they had been experiencing. It hurts her to see her children suffering from poor living. Now, she is asking for PHP 5,000 to purchase cooking oil, canned goods, noodles, and sugar. She hopes that through these goods, she could provide a better living for her children.

loans.use: to purchase cooking oil, canned goods, noodles, and sugar

loans.name: Miguel  Martin

texts.es:
Miguel  es un hombre de 20 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por salir adelante, gracias a su esfuerzo y al apoyo de sus padres, Miguel se encuentra estudiando la carrera profesional de Administración de Empresas, en sus ratos libres le gusta jugar futbol con sus amigos y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Arroz con Pollo para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Miguel trabaja como supervisor de prevención en una empresa de su ciudad, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 10 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien por su buen desempeño y por el trato amable que brinda a los demás.
Miguel se encuentra muy agradecida con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de una refrigeradora y una cocina, los cuales le servirán de mucho ya que podrá conservar y preparar sus alimentos, de esta manera Miguel mejorara la salud e higiene de él y su familia, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para lograr su gran sueño de tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
Miguel is a 20-year-old gentleman who lives in the city of Ica. He is a friendly, hardworking, and enthusiastic person who dedicates all of his efforts to getting ahead. Thanks to his efforts and the support of his parents, Miguel is studying for a professional degree in Business Administration. In his free time, he enjoys playing soccer with his friends. On a few occasions, he prepares a delicious dish of chicken and rice to share with his family.

Through his own initiative and with great effort and dedication, Miguel works as a prevention supervisor for a company in the city. He begins every day in the early morning hours and is able to work approximately 10 hours. Miguel enjoys his work and believes he is doing well because he is well-adjusted in his job and he treats others in a friendly manner.

Miguel is very grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the assistance they have provided, he will be able to purchase a refrigerator and a stove. These items will be very helpful because he will able to preserve and prepare food. As a result, Miguel will provide healthier and more sanitary conditions for himself and his family. He will continue to work and strive toward his greatest dream of having a house of his own.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and a stove.

loans.name: Jessica Consuelo

texts.es:
Jessica Consuelo tiene 34 años de edad es separada tiene cinco hijos, vive con los hijos en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los ríos.

LA VRC DULCE SENTIMIENTO, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto Caimito II, parroquia  Puerto Pechiche Perteneciente al Cantón Pueblo Viejo, Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, arroz y frejol gandul.

Jessica Consuelo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz, fréjol gandul las compras y las ventas las realiza en el cantón Ventanas.
 
Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, urea, insecticidas, ranger, líquido mata maleza. para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

Con el dinero  del prestamo anterior pudo comprar semillas e insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
En la familia la relación es muy buena, en el trabajo ha aumentado la producción, los ingresos a mejorado mucho porque ahora con la venta de los productos obtiene más ingresos. 

El sueño es cumplir con todas las metas. En elt iempo libre le gusta jugar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Jessica Consuelo is 34 years old, separated from her spouse, and has five children. She lives with her children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The Communal Bank “Dulce Sentimiento” (Sweet Sentiment) is located in the neighborhood of Caimito II in the parish of Puerto Pechiche, canton of Pueblo Viejo. The members of the Communal Bank are short-cycle farmers who grow corn, rice, and pigeon peas.

Jessica Consuelo is a farmer who grows corn, rice, and pigeon peas. Her purchases and sales are conducted in the canton of Ventanas. Jessica is requesting a loan in order to buy seeds, urea, insecticides, Ranger (a brand of herbicide), and liquid weed killer so that she can keep her crops in good condition.

With her previous loan, she was able to buy seeds and farming supplies such as urea, weed killer, fertilizers, and poisons so that she could maintain the excellent condition of her crops. Her family is doing well and she has been able to increase production as a result of her work. Jessica’s income has improved greatly because she is able to generate more revenue through the sale of her products.

Her dream is to accomplish all of her goals. In her free time, Jessica Consuelo enjoys playing with her children.

loans.use: to buy seeds, urea, insecticides, herbicide, and liquid weed killer.

loans.name: Roza

texts.ru: Розе 54 года, вдова, имеет 5 детей. В качестве источника дохода для семьи, Роза занимается животноводством. Начатое 20 лет назад с 10,000 сом (KGS) хозяйство на сегодня приносит около 5,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. На данный момент в хозяйстве Розы имеется 2 дойные коровы, 2 бычка, 1 лошадь и 10 овец. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Роза обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Роза планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en:
Roza is 54 years old, widowed, and has 5 children. To provide a source of income for her family, she raises livestock. Roza's business, started 20 years ago with 10,000 som (KGS), presently earns around 5,000 som (KGS) per month. Currently, she keeps 2 dairy cows, 2 bulls, 1 horse and 10 sheep.

In order to continue developing her business, Roza has turned to Bai Tushum & Partners for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy additional livestock. She plans to invest her profits into further expansion of her herd.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Las Brisas Cienega Group

texts.es:
La señora Faustina Dominga  esta casada, tiene 26 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar en una escuela, tiene 2 hijos pequeños, se dedica a la confección de blusa y al comercio, inicio este trabajo siendo operaria e inicio su propio negocio con un poco de capital, gracias a al esfuerzo que ha hecho lleva 7 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien también se dedica a la confección de blusas.

Solicita un préstamo que sera invertido para la compra de telas e hilos para la confección de blusas típicas, las cuales tienen demanda en cu comunidad, en el futuro espera tener un negocio posicionado y con trabajadores.
texts.en:
Faustina Dominga is 26 years old and married.  She did not have the opportunity to study at school.  She has two young children and makes blouses and has a business.  She started in this trade as a machinist and started her own business with a little capital.  Thanks to her effort, she now has seven years experience and receives support from her husband who also makes blouses.

Faustina is applying for this loan to buy materials and threads to make typical blouses, which are in demand in the community.  In the future she hopes to have a well-established business with its own workers..

loans.use: to buy materials for dressmaking.

loans.name: Tat'yana

texts.ru:
Татьяна  -  женщина фермер.  С 2004 года занимается выращиванием огурцов и помидоров.
Справляться по хозяйству ей помогает муж и 13 -ти летний  сын, который учится в школе.
Развитие деятельности начиналось с выращивания молодых огурцов.
Татьяна с мужем решила приобрести пленку для перекрытия теплицы, агроволокно  для защиты от морозов и ветров в зимний период.
В планах на будущее:  поставить еще две теплицы, посадить виноград.
В личных планах: построить новый дом.
Нуждается в вашей помощи для финансирования пленки и агроволокна.
texts.en:
Tat'yana is a farmer. Since 2004, she has been cultivating cucumbers and tomatoes. In her business, Tat'yana is assisted by her husband and her 13-year-old son who currently attends high school. Tat'yana started her farm by growing small cucumbers.
